verses.translation: It is Allah Who sends forth the Winds, so that they raise up the Clouds, and We drive them to a land that is dead, and revive the earth therewith after its death: even so (will be) the Resurrection!

verses.content: مَن كَانَ يُرِيدُ الْعِزَّةَ فَلِلَّهِ الْعِزَّةُ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِلَيْهِ يَصْعَدُ الْكَلِمُ الطَّيِّبُ وَالْعَمَلُ الصَّالِحُ يَرْفَعُهُ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ يَمْكُرُونَ السَّيِّئَاتِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ ۖ وَمَكْرُ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُوَ يَبُورُ
verses.translation: If any do seek for glory and power,- to Allah belong all glory and power. To Him mount up (all) Words of Purity: It is He Who exalts each Deed of Righteousness. Those that lay Plots of Evil,- for them is a Penalty terrible; and the plotting of such will be void (of result).

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ خَلَقَكُم مِّن تُرَابٍ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا ۚ وَمَا تَحْمِلُ مِنْ أُنثَىٰ وَلَا تَضَعُ إِلَّا بِعِلْمِهِ ۚ وَمَا يُعَمَّرُ مِن مُّعَمَّرٍ وَلَا يُنقَصُ مِنْ عُمُرِهِ إِلَّا فِي كِتَابٍ ۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: And Allah did create you from dust; then from a sperm-drop; then He made you in pairs. And no female conceives, or lays down (her load), but with His knowledge. Nor is a man long-lived granted length of days, nor is a part cut off from his life, but is in a Decree (ordained). All this is easy to Allah.

verses.content: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْبَحْرَانِ هَـٰذَا عَذْبٌ فُرَاتٌ سَائِغٌ شَرَابُهُ وَهَـٰذَا مِلْحٌ أُجَاجٌ ۖ وَمِن كُلٍّ تَأْكُلُونَ لَحْمًا طَرِيًّا وَتَسْتَخْرِجُونَ حِلْيَةً تَلْبَسُونَهَا ۖ وَتَرَى الْفُلْكَ فِيهِ مَوَاخِرَ لِتَبْتَغُوا مِن فَضْلِهِ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: Nor are the two bodies of flowing water alike,- the one palatable, sweet, and pleasant to drink, and the other, salt and bitter. Yet from each (kind of water) do ye eat flesh fresh and tender, and ye extract ornaments to wear; and thou seest the ships therein that plough the waves, that ye may seek (thus) of the Bounty of Allah that ye may be grateful.

verses.content: يُولِجُ اللَّيْلَ فِي النَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ النَّهَارَ فِي اللَّيْلِ وَسَخَّرَ الشَّمْسَ وَالْقَمَرَ كُلٌّ يَجْرِي لِأَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِ مَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِن قِطْمِيرٍ
verses.translation: He merges Night into Day, and he merges Day into Night, and he has subjected the sun and the moon (to his Law): each one runs its course for a term appointed. Such is Allah your Lord: to Him belongs all Dominion. And those whom ye invoke besides Him have not the least power.

verses.content: إِن تَدْعُوهُمْ لَا يَسْمَعُوا دُعَاءَكُمْ وَلَوْ سَمِعُوا مَا اسْتَجَابُوا لَكُمْ ۖ وَيَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ يَكْفُرُونَ بِشِرْكِكُمْ ۚ وَلَا يُنَبِّئُكَ مِثْلُ خَبِيرٍ
verses.translation: If ye invoke them, they will not listen to your call, and if they were to listen, they cannot answer your (prayer). On the Day of Judgment they will reject your "Partnership". and none, (O man!) can tell thee (the Truth) like the One Who is acquainted with all things.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ أَنتُمُ الْفُقَرَاءُ إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ وَاللَّهُ هُوَ الْغَنِيُّ الْحَمِيدُ
verses.translation: O ye men! It is ye that have need of Allah: but Allah is the One Free of all wants, worthy of all praise.

verses.content: إِن يَشَأْ يُذْهِبْكُمْ وَيَأْتِ بِخَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.translation: If He so pleased, He could blot you out and bring in a New Creation.

verses.content: وَمَا ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى اللَّهِ بِعَزِيزٍ
verses.translation: Nor is that (at all) difficult for Allah.

verses.content: وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۚ وَإِن تَدْعُ مُثْقَلَةٌ إِلَىٰ حِمْلِهَا لَا يُحْمَلْ مِنْهُ شَيْءٌ وَلَوْ كَانَ ذَا قُرْبَىٰ ۗ إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ الَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِالْغَيْبِ وَأَقَامُوا الصَّلَاةَ ۚ وَمَن تَزَكَّىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَتَزَكَّىٰ لِنَفْسِهِ ۚ وَإِلَى اللَّهِ الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Nor can a bearer of burdens bear another's burdens if one heavily laden should call another to (bear) his load. Not the least portion of it can be carried (by the other). Even though he be nearly related. Thou canst but admonish such as fear their Lord unseen and establish regular Prayer. And whoever purifies himself does so for the benefit of his own soul; and the destination (of all) is to Allah.

verses.content: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْأَعْمَىٰ وَالْبَصِيرُ
verses.translation: The blind and the seeing are not alike;

verses.content: وَلَا الظُّلُمَاتُ وَلَا النُّورُ
verses.translation: Nor are the depths of Darkness and the Light;

verses.content: وَلَا الظِّلُّ وَلَا الْحَرُورُ
verses.translation: Nor are the (chilly) shade and the (genial) heat of the sun:

verses.content: وَمَا يَسْتَوِي الْأَحْيَاءُ وَلَا الْأَمْوَاتُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُسْمِعُ مَن يَشَاءُ ۖ وَمَا أَنتَ بِمُسْمِعٍ مَّن فِي الْقُبُورِ
verses.translation: Nor are alike those that are living and those that are dead. Allah can make any that He wills to hear; but thou canst not make those to hear who are (buried) in graves.

verses.content: إِنْ أَنتَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ
verses.translation: Thou art no other than a warner.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَاكَ بِالْحَقِّ بَشِيرًا وَنَذِيرًا ۚ وَإِن مِّنْ أُمَّةٍ إِلَّا خَلَا فِيهَا نَذِيرٌ
verses.translation: Verily We have sent thee in truth, as a bearer of glad tidings, and as a warner: and there never was a people, without a warner having lived among them (in the past).

verses.content: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدْ كَذَّبَ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ جَاءَتْهُمْ رُسُلُهُم بِالْبَيِّنَاتِ وَبِالزُّبُرِ وَبِالْكِتَابِ الْمُنِيرِ
verses.translation: And if they reject thee, so did their predecessors, to whom came their messengers with Clear Signs, Books of dark prophecies, and the Book of Enlightenment.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَخَذْتُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
verses.translation: In the end did I punish those who rejected Faith: and how (terrible) was My rejection (of them)!

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَخْرَجْنَا بِهِ ثَمَرَاتٍ مُّخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَانُهَا ۚ وَمِنَ الْجِبَالِ جُدَدٌ بِيضٌ وَحُمْرٌ مُّخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَانُهَا وَغَرَابِيبُ سُودٌ
verses.translation: Seest thou not that Allah sends down rain from the sky? With it We then bring out produce of various colours. And in the mountains are tracts white and red, of various shades of colour, and black intense in hue.

verses.content: وَمِنَ النَّاسِ وَالدَّوَابِّ وَالْأَنْعَامِ مُخْتَلِفٌ أَلْوَانُهُ كَذَٰلِكَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَخْشَى اللَّهَ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ الْعُلَمَاءُ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ غَفُورٌ
verses.translation: And so amongst men and crawling creatures and cattle, are they of various colours. Those truly fear Allah, among His Servants, who have knowledge: for Allah is Exalted in Might, Oft-Forgiving.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَتْلُونَ كِتَابَ اللَّهِ وَأَقَامُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَأَنفَقُوا مِمَّا رَزَقْنَاهُمْ سِرًّا وَعَلَانِيَةً يَرْجُونَ تِجَارَةً لَّن تَبُورَ
verses.translation: Those who rehearse the Book of Allah, establish regular Prayer, and spend (in Charity) out of what We have provided for them, secretly and openly, hope for a commerce that will never fail:

verses.content: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمْ أُجُورَهُمْ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضْلِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ غَفُورٌ شَكُورٌ
verses.translation: For He will pay them their meed, nay, He will give them (even) more out of His Bounty: for He is Oft-Forgiving, Most Ready to appreciate (service).

verses.content: وَالَّذِي أَوْحَيْنَا إِلَيْكَ مِنَ الْكِتَابِ هُوَ الْحَقُّ مُصَدِّقًا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بِعِبَادِهِ لَخَبِيرٌ بَصِيرٌ
verses.translation: That which We have revealed to thee of the Book is the Truth,- confirming what was (revealed) before it: for Allah is assuredly- with respect to His Servants - well acquainted and Fully Observant.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَوْرَثْنَا الْكِتَابَ الَّذِينَ اصْطَفَيْنَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ۖ فَمِنْهُمْ ظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِ وَمِنْهُم مُّقْتَصِدٌ وَمِنْهُمْ سَابِقٌ بِالْخَيْرَاتِ بِإِذْنِ اللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ الْفَضْلُ الْكَبِيرُ
verses.translation: Then We have given the Book for inheritance to such of Our Servants as We have chosen: but there are among them some who wrong their own souls; some who follow a middle course; and some who are, by Allah's leave, foremost in good deeds; that is the highest Grace.

verses.content: جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ يَدْخُلُونَهَا يُحَلَّوْنَ فِيهَا مِنْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٍ وَلُؤْلُؤًا ۖ وَلِبَاسُهُمْ فِيهَا حَرِيرٌ
verses.translation: Gardens of Eternity will they enter: therein will they be adorned with bracelets of gold and pearls; and their garments there will be of silk.

verses.content: وَقَالُوا الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَذْهَبَ عَنَّا الْحَزَنَ ۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورٌ شَكُورٌ
verses.translation: And they will say: "Praise be to Allah, Who has removed from us (all) sorrow: for our Lord is indeed Oft-Forgiving Ready to appreciate (service):

verses.content: الَّذِي أَحَلَّنَا دَارَ الْمُقَامَةِ مِن فَضْلِهِ لَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا نَصَبٌ وَلَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا لُغُوبٌ
verses.translation: "Who has, out of His Bounty, settled us in a Home that will last: no toil nor sense of weariness shall touch us therein."

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَهُمْ نَارُ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يُقْضَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ فَيَمُوتُوا وَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْهُم مِّنْ عَذَابِهَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي كُلَّ كَفُورٍ
verses.translation: But those who reject (Allah) - for them will be the Fire of Hell: No term shall be determined for them, so they should die, nor shall its Penalty be lightened for them. Thus do We reward every ungrateful one!

verses.content: وَهُمْ يَصْطَرِخُونَ فِيهَا رَبَّنَا أَخْرِجْنَا نَعْمَلْ صَالِحًا غَيْرَ الَّذِي كُنَّا نَعْمَلُ ۚ أَوَلَمْ نُعَمِّرْكُم مَّا يَتَذَكَّرُ فِيهِ مَن تَذَكَّرَ وَجَاءَكُمُ النَّذِيرُ ۖ فَذُوقُوا فَمَا لِلظَّالِمِينَ مِن نَّصِيرٍ
verses.translation: Therein will they cry aloud (for assistance): "Our Lord! Bring us out: we shall work righteousness, not the (deeds) we used to do!" - "Did We not give you long enough life so that he that would should receive admonition? and (moreover) the warner came to you. So taste ye (the fruits of your deeds): for the wrong-doers there is no helper."

verses.content: إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَالِمُ غَيْبِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُ عَلِيمٌ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: Verily Allah knows (all) the hidden things of the heavens and the earth: verily He has full knowledge of all that is in (men's) hearts.

verses.content: هُوَ الَّذِي جَعَلَكُمْ خَلَائِفَ فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ فَمَن كَفَرَ فَعَلَيْهِ كُفْرُهُ ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ الْكَافِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا مَقْتًا ۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ الْكَافِرِينَ كُفْرُهُمْ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
verses.translation: He it is That has made you inheritors in the earth: if, then, any do reject (Allah), their rejection (works) against themselves: their rejection but adds to the odium for the Unbelievers in the sight of their Lord: their rejection but adds to (their own) undoing.

verses.content: قُلْ أَرَأَيْتُمْ شُرَكَاءَكُمُ الَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ أَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقُوا مِنَ الْأَرْضِ أَمْ لَهُمْ شِرْكٌ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ أَمْ آتَيْنَاهُمْ كِتَابًا فَهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَتٍ مِّنْهُ ۚ بَلْ إِن يَعِدُ الظَّالِمُونَ بَعْضُهُم بَعْضًا إِلَّا غُرُورًا
verses.translation: Say: "Have ye seen (these) 'Partners' of yours whom ye call upon besides Allah? Show Me what it is they have created in the (wide) earth. Or have they a share in the heavens? Or have We given them a Book from which they (can derive) clear (evidence)?- Nay, the wrong-doers promise each other nothing but delusions.

verses.content: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُمْسِكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ أَن تَزُولَا ۚ وَلَئِن زَالَتَا إِنْ أَمْسَكَهُمَا مِنْ أَحَدٍ مِّن بَعْدِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ حَلِيمًا غَفُورًا
verses.translation: It is Allah Who sustains the heavens and the earth, lest they cease (to function): and if they should fail, there is none - not one - can sustain them thereafter: Verily He is Most Forbearing, Oft-Forgiving.

verses.content: وَأَقْسَمُوا بِاللَّهِ جَهْدَ أَيْمَانِهِمْ لَئِن جَاءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ لَّيَكُونُنَّ أَهْدَىٰ مِنْ إِحْدَى الْأُمَمِ ۖ فَلَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ نَذِيرٌ مَّا زَادَهُمْ إِلَّا نُفُورًا
verses.translation: They swore their strongest oaths by Allah that if a warner came to them, they would follow his guidance better than any (other) of the Peoples: But when a warner came to them, it has only increased their flight (from righteousness),-

verses.content: اسْتِكْبَارًا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَكْرَ السَّيِّئِ ۚ وَلَا يَحِيقُ الْمَكْرُ السَّيِّئُ إِلَّا بِأَهْلِهِ ۚ فَهَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا سُنَّتَ الْأَوَّلِينَ ۚ فَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ اللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًا ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ اللَّهِ تَحْوِيلًا
verses.translation: On account of their arrogance in the land and their plotting of Evil, but the plotting of Evil will hem in only the authors thereof. Now are they but looking for the way the ancients were dealt with? But no change wilt thou find in Allah's way (of dealing): no turning off wilt thou find in Allah's way (of dealing).

verses.content: أَوَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ وَكَانُوا أَشَدَّ مِنْهُمْ قُوَّةً ۚ وَمَا كَانَ اللَّهُ لِيُعْجِزَهُ مِن شَيْءٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَلَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ عَلِيمًا قَدِيرًا
verses.translation: Do they not travel through the earth, and see what was the End of those before them,- though they were superior to them in strength? Nor is Allah to be frustrated by anything whatever in the heavens or on earth: for He is All-Knowing. All-Powerful.

verses.content: وَلَوْ يُؤَاخِذُ اللَّهُ النَّاسَ بِمَا كَسَبُوا مَا تَرَكَ عَلَىٰ ظَهْرِهَا مِن دَابَّةٍ وَلَـٰكِن يُؤَخِّرُهُمْ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۖ فَإِذَا جَاءَ أَجَلُهُمْ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِ بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: If Allah were to punish men according to what they deserve. He would not leave on the back of the (earth) a single living creature: but He gives them respite for a stated Term: when their Term expires, verily Allah has in His sight all His Servants.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يس
verses.translation: Ya Sin.

verses.content: وَالْقُرْآنِ الْحَكِيمِ
verses.translation: By the Qur'an, full of Wisdom,-

verses.content: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Thou art indeed one of the messengers,

verses.content: عَلَىٰ صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
verses.translation: On a Straight Way.

verses.content: تَنزِيلَ الْعَزِيزِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: It is a Revelation sent down by (Him), the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.

verses.content: لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّا أُنذِرَ آبَاؤُهُمْ فَهُمْ غَافِلُونَ
verses.translation: In order that thou mayest admonish a people, whose fathers had received no admonition, and who therefore remain heedless (of the Signs of Allah).

verses.content: لَقَدْ حَقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَىٰ أَكْثَرِهِمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: The Word is proved true against the greater part of them: for they do not believe.

verses.content: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَا فِي أَعْنَاقِهِمْ أَغْلَالًا فَهِيَ إِلَى الْأَذْقَانِ فَهُم مُّقْمَحُونَ
verses.translation: We have put yokes round their necks right up to their chins, so that their heads are forced up (and they cannot see).

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا مِن بَيْنِ أَيْدِيهِمْ سَدًّا وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِمْ سَدًّا فَأَغْشَيْنَاهُمْ فَهُمْ لَا يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And We have put a bar in front of them and a bar behind them, and further, We have covered them up; so that they cannot see.

verses.content: وَسَوَاءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ أَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: The same is it to them whether thou admonish them or thou do not admonish them: they will not believe.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ اتَّبَعَ الذِّكْرَ وَخَشِيَ الرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ ۖ فَبَشِّرْهُ بِمَغْفِرَةٍ وَأَجْرٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: Thou canst but admonish such a one as follows the Message and fears the (Lord) Most Gracious, unseen: give such a one, therefore, good tidings, of Forgiveness and a Reward most generous.

verses.content: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي الْمَوْتَىٰ وَنَكْتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُوا وَآثَارَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ فِي إِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Verily We shall give life to the dead, and We record that which they send before and that which they leave behind, and of all things have We taken account in a clear Book (of evidence).

verses.content: وَاضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصْحَابَ الْقَرْيَةِ إِذْ جَاءَهَا الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: Set forth to them, by way of a parable, the (story of) the Companions of the City. Behold!, there came messengers to it.

verses.content: إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْهِمُ اثْنَيْنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزْنَا بِثَالِثٍ فَقَالُوا إِنَّا إِلَيْكُم مُّرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: When We (first) sent to them two messengers, they rejected them: But We strengthened them with a third: they said, "Truly, we have been sent on a mission to you."

verses.content: قَالُوا مَا أَنتُمْ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَمَا أَنزَلَ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ مِن شَيْءٍ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا تَكْذِبُونَ
verses.translation: The (people) said: "Ye are only men like ourselves; and (Allah) Most Gracious sends no sort of revelation: ye do nothing but lie."

verses.content: قَالُوا رَبُّنَا يَعْلَمُ إِنَّا إِلَيْكُمْ لَمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: They said: "Our Lord doth know that we have been sent on a mission to you:

verses.content: وَمَا عَلَيْنَا إِلَّا الْبَلَاغُ الْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: "And our duty is only to proclaim the clear Message."

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّا تَطَيَّرْنَا بِكُمْ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهُوا لَنَرْجُمَنَّكُمْ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: The (people) said: "for us, we augur an evil omen from you: if ye desist not, we will certainly stone you. And a grievous punishment indeed will be inflicted on you by us."

verses.content: قَالُوا طَائِرُكُم مَّعَكُمْ ۚ أَئِن ذُكِّرْتُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّسْرِفُونَ
verses.translation: They said: "Your evil omens are with yourselves: (deem ye this an evil omen). If ye are admonished? Nay, but ye are a people transgressing all bounds!"

verses.content: وَجَاءَ مِنْ أَقْصَى الْمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٌ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ اتَّبِعُوا الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Then there came running, from the farthest part of the City, a man, saying, "O my people! Obey the messengers:

verses.content: اتَّبِعُوا مَن لَّا يَسْأَلُكُمْ أَجْرًا وَهُم مُّهْتَدُونَ
verses.translation: "Obey those who ask no reward of you (for themselves), and who have themselves received Guidance.

verses.content: وَمَا لِيَ لَا أَعْبُدُ الَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: "It would not be reasonable in me if I did not serve Him Who created me, and to Whom ye shall (all) be brought back.

verses.content: أَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِ آلِهَةً إِن يُرِدْنِ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ بِضُرٍّ لَّا تُغْنِ عَنِّي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ
verses.translation: "Shall I take (other) gods besides Him? If (Allah) Most Gracious should intend some adversity for me, of no use whatever will be their intercession for me, nor can they deliver me.

verses.content: إِنِّي إِذًا لَّفِي ضَلَالٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: "I would indeed, if I were to do so, be in manifest Error.

verses.content: إِنِّي آمَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمْ فَاسْمَعُونِ
verses.translation: "For me, I have faith in the Lord of you (all): listen, then, to me!"

verses.content: قِيلَ ادْخُلِ الْجَنَّةَ ۖ قَالَ يَا لَيْتَ قَوْمِي يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: It was said: "Enter thou the Garden." He said: "Ah me! Would that my People knew (what I know)!-

verses.content: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ الْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.translation: "For that my Lord has granted me Forgiveness and has enrolled me among those held in honour!"

verses.content: وَمَا أَنزَلْنَا عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ مِن بَعْدِهِ مِن جُندٍ مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ
verses.translation: And We sent not down against his People, after him, any hosts from heaven, nor was it needful for Us so to do.

verses.content: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ خَامِدُونَ
verses.translation: It was no more than a single mighty Blast, and behold! they were (like ashes) quenched and silent.

verses.content: يَا حَسْرَةً عَلَى الْعِبَادِ ۚ مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا بِهِ يَسْتَهْزِئُونَ
verses.translation: Ah! Alas for (My) Servants! There comes not a messenger to them but they mock him!

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّنَ الْقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: See they not how many generations before them we destroyed? Not to them will they return:

verses.content: وَإِن كُلٌّ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: But each one of them all - will be brought before Us (for judgment).

verses.content: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمُ الْأَرْضُ الْمَيْتَةُ أَحْيَيْنَاهَا وَأَخْرَجْنَا مِنْهَا حَبًّا فَمِنْهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: A Sign for them is the earth that is dead: We do give it life, and produce grain therefrom, of which ye do eat.

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا جَنَّاتٍ مِّن نَّخِيلٍ وَأَعْنَابٍ وَفَجَّرْنَا فِيهَا مِنَ الْعُيُونِ
verses.translation: And We produce therein orchard with date-palms and vines, and We cause springs to gush forth therein:

verses.content: لِيَأْكُلُوا مِن ثَمَرِهِ وَمَا عَمِلَتْهُ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: That they may enjoy the fruits of this (artistry): It was not their hands that made this: will they not then give thanks?

verses.content: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ الْأَزْوَاجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنبِتُ الْأَرْضُ وَمِنْ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Glory to Allah, Who created in pairs all things that the earth produces, as well as their own (human) kind and (other) things of which they have no knowledge.

verses.content: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمُ اللَّيْلُ نَسْلَخُ مِنْهُ النَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظْلِمُونَ
verses.translation: And a Sign for them is the Night: We withdraw therefrom the Day, and behold they are plunged in darkness;

verses.content: وَالشَّمْسُ تَجْرِي لِمُسْتَقَرٍّ لَّهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقْدِيرُ الْعَزِيزِ الْعَلِيمِ
verses.translation: And the sun runs his course for a period determined for him: that is the decree of (Him), the Exalted in Might, the All-Knowing.

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرَ قَدَّرْنَاهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَالْعُرْجُونِ الْقَدِيمِ
verses.translation: And the Moon,- We have measured for her mansions (to traverse) till she returns like the old (and withered) lower part of a date-stalk.

verses.content: لَا الشَّمْسُ يَنبَغِي لَهَا أَن تُدْرِكَ الْقَمَرَ وَلَا اللَّيْلُ سَابِقُ النَّهَارِ ۚ وَكُلٌّ فِي فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
verses.translation: It is not permitted to the Sun to catch up the Moon, nor can the Night outstrip the Day: Each (just) swims along in (its own) orbit (according to Law).

verses.content: وَآيَةٌ لَّهُمْ أَنَّا حَمَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ فِي الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ
verses.translation: And a Sign for them is that We bore their race (through the Flood) in the loaded Ark;

verses.content: وَخَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثْلِهِ مَا يَرْكَبُونَ
verses.translation: And We have created for them similar (vessels) on which they ride.

verses.content: وَإِن نَّشَأْ نُغْرِقْهُمْ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنقَذُونَ
verses.translation: If it were Our Will, We could drown them: then would there be no helper (to hear their cry), nor could they be delivered,

verses.content: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَمَتَاعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: Except by way of Mercy from Us, and by way of (world) convenience (to serve them) for a time.

verses.content: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ اتَّقُوا مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَمَا خَلْفَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.translation: When they are told, "Fear ye that which is before you and that which will be after you, in order that ye may receive Mercy," (they turn back).

verses.content: وَمَا تَأْتِيهِم مِّنْ آيَةٍ مِّنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ إِلَّا كَانُوا عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: Not a Sign comes to them from among the Signs of their Lord, but they turn away therefrom.

verses.content: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ أَنفِقُوا مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ اللَّهُ قَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا أَنُطْعِمُ مَن لَّوْ يَشَاءُ اللَّهُ أَطْعَمَهُ إِنْ أَنتُمْ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَالٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: And when they are told, "Spend ye of (the bounties) with which Allah has provided you," the Unbelievers say to those who believe: "Shall we then feed those whom, if Allah had so willed, He would have fed, (Himself)?- Ye are in nothing but manifest error."

verses.content: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا الْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: Further, they say, "When will this promise (come to pass), if what ye say is true?"

verses.content: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً تَأْخُذُهُمْ وَهُمْ يَخِصِّمُونَ
verses.translation: They will not (have to) wait for aught but a single Blast: it will seize them while they are yet disputing among themselves!

verses.content: فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ تَوْصِيَةً وَلَا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: No (chance) will they then have, by will, to dispose (of their affairs), nor to return to their own people!

verses.content: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَنسِلُونَ
verses.translation: The trumpet shall be sounded, when behold! from the sepulchres (men) will rush forth to their Lord!

verses.content: قَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا مَن بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرْقَدِنَا ۜ ۗ هَـٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَصَدَقَ الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: They will say: "Ah! Woe unto us! Who hath raised us up from our beds of repose?"... (A voice will say:) "This is what (Allah) Most Gracious had promised. And true was the word of the messengers!"

verses.content: إِن كَانَتْ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَإِذَا هُمْ جَمِيعٌ لَّدَيْنَا مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: It will be no more than a single Blast, when lo! they will all be brought up before Us!

verses.content: فَالْيَوْمَ لَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْئًا وَلَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: Then, on that Day, not a soul will be wronged in the least, and ye shall but be repaid the meeds of your past Deeds.

verses.content: إِنَّ أَصْحَابَ الْجَنَّةِ الْيَوْمَ فِي شُغُلٍ فَاكِهُونَ
verses.translation: Verily the Companions of the Garden shall that Day have joy in all that they do;

verses.content: هُمْ وَأَزْوَاجُهُمْ فِي ظِلَالٍ عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ مُتَّكِئُونَ
verses.translation: They and their associates will be in groves of (cool) shade, reclining on Thrones (of dignity);

verses.content: لَهُمْ فِيهَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
verses.translation: (Every) fruit (enjoyment) will be there for them; they shall have whatever they call for;

verses.content: سَلَامٌ قَوْلًا مِّن رَّبٍّ رَّحِيمٍ
verses.translation: "Peace!" - a word (of salutation) from a Lord Most Merciful!

verses.content: وَامْتَازُوا الْيَوْمَ أَيُّهَا الْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: "And O ye in sin! Get ye apart this Day!

verses.content: أَلَمْ أَعْهَدْ إِلَيْكُمْ يَا بَنِي آدَمَ أَن لَّا تَعْبُدُوا الشَّيْطَانَ ۖ إِنَّهُ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: "Did I not enjoin on you, O ye Children of Adam, that ye should not worship Satan; for that he was to you an enemy avowed?-

verses.content: وَأَنِ اعْبُدُونِي ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَاطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: "And that ye should worship Me, (for that) this was the Straight Way?

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: "But he did lead astray a great multitude of you. Did ye not, then, understand?

verses.content: هَـٰذِهِ جَهَنَّمُ الَّتِي كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: "This is the Hell of which ye were (repeatedly) warned!

verses.content: اصْلَوْهَا الْيَوْمَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
verses.translation: "Embrace ye the (fire) this Day, for that ye (persistently) rejected (Truth)."

verses.content: الْيَوْمَ نَخْتِمُ عَلَىٰ أَفْوَاهِهِمْ وَتُكَلِّمُنَا أَيْدِيهِمْ وَتَشْهَدُ أَرْجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: That Day shall We set a seal on their mouths. But their hands will speak to us, and their feet bear witness, to all that they did.

verses.content: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَطَمَسْنَا عَلَىٰ أَعْيُنِهِمْ فَاسْتَبَقُوا الصِّرَاطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: If it had been our Will, We could surely have blotted out their eyes; then should they have run about groping for the Path, but how could they have seen?

verses.content: وَلَوْ نَشَاءُ لَمَسَخْنَاهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمْ فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مُضِيًّا وَلَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: And if it had been Our Will, We could have transformed them (to remain) in their places; then should they have been unable to move about, nor could they have returned (after error).

verses.content: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرْهُ نُنَكِّسْهُ فِي الْخَلْقِ ۖ أَفَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: If We grant long life to any, We cause him to be reversed in nature: Will they not then understand?

verses.content: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَاهُ الشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنبَغِي لَهُ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْآنٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: We have not instructed the (Prophet) in Poetry, nor is it meet for him: this is no less than a Message and a Qur'an making things clear:

verses.content: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيًّا وَيَحِقَّ الْقَوْلُ عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ
verses.translation: That it may give admonition to any (who are) alive, and that the charge may be proved against those who reject (Truth).

verses.content: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَا أَنْعَامًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَالِكُونَ
verses.translation: See they not that it is We Who have created for them - among the things which Our hands have fashioned - cattle, which are under their dominion?-

verses.content: وَذَلَّلْنَاهَا لَهُمْ فَمِنْهَا رَكُوبُهُمْ وَمِنْهَا يَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And that We have subjected them to their (use)? of them some do carry them and some they eat:

verses.content: وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مَنَافِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ ۖ أَفَلَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: And they have (other) profits from them (besides), and they get (milk) to drink. Will they not then be grateful?

verses.content: وَاتَّخَذُوا مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ آلِهَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: Yet they take (for worship) gods other than Allah, (hoping) that they might be helped!

verses.content: لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُمْ جُندٌ مُّحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: They have not the power to help them: but they will be brought up (before Our Judgment-seat) as a troop (to be condemned).

verses.content: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ ۘ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
verses.translation: Let not their speech, then, grieve thee. Verily We know what they hide as well as what they disclose.

verses.content: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ الْإِنسَانُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Doth not man see that it is We Who created him from sperm? yet behold! he (stands forth) as an open adversary!

verses.content: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلًا وَنَسِيَ خَلْقَهُ ۖ قَالَ مَن يُحْيِي الْعِظَامَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٌ
verses.translation: And he makes comparisons for Us, and forgets his own (origin and) Creation: He says, "Who can give life to (dry) bones and decomposed ones (at that)?"

verses.content: قُلْ يُحْيِيهَا الَّذِي أَنشَأَهَا أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلْقٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Say, "He will give them life Who created them for the first time! for He is Well-versed in every kind of creation!-

verses.content: الَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ الشَّجَرِ الْأَخْضَرِ نَارًا فَإِذَا أَنتُم مِّنْهُ تُوقِدُونَ
verses.translation: "The same Who produces for you fire out of the green tree, when behold! ye kindle therewith (your own fires)!

verses.content: أَوَلَيْسَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَن يَخْلُقَ مِثْلَهُم ۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ الْخَلَّاقُ الْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: "Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like thereof?" - Yea, indeed! for He is the Creator Supreme, of skill and knowledge (infinite)!

verses.content: إِنَّمَا أَمْرُهُ إِذَا أَرَادَ شَيْئًا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُ كُن فَيَكُونُ
verses.translation: Verily, when He intends a thing, His Command is, "be", and it is!

verses.content: فَسُبْحَانَ الَّذِي بِيَدِهِ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَإِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: So glory to Him in Whose hands is the dominion of all things: and to Him will ye be all brought back.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالصَّافَّاتِ صَفًّا
verses.translation: By those who range themselves in ranks,

verses.content: فَالزَّاجِرَاتِ زَجْرًا
verses.translation: And so are strong in repelling (evil),

verses.content: فَالتَّالِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: And thus proclaim the Message (of Allah)!

verses.content: إِنَّ إِلَـٰهَكُمْ لَوَاحِدٌ
verses.translation: Verily, verily, your Allah is one!-

verses.content: رَّبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ الْمَشَارِقِ
verses.translation: Lord of the heavens and of the earth and all between them, and Lord of every point at the rising of the sun!

verses.content: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا السَّمَاءَ الدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ الْكَوَاكِبِ
verses.translation: We have indeed decked the lower heaven with beauty (in) the stars,-

verses.content: وَحِفْظًا مِّن كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ مَّارِدٍ
verses.translation: (For beauty) and for guard against all obstinate rebellious evil spirits,

verses.content: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى الْمَلَإِ الْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٍ
verses.translation: (So) they should not strain their ears in the direction of the Exalted Assembly but be cast away from every side,

verses.content: دُحُورًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ وَاصِبٌ
verses.translation: Repulsed, for they are under a perpetual penalty,

verses.content: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ الْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُ شِهَابٌ ثَاقِبٌ
verses.translation: Except such as snatch away something by stealth, and they are pursued by a flaming fire, of piercing brightness.

verses.content: فَاسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَا ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاهُم مِّن طِينٍ لَّازِبٍ
verses.translation: Just ask their opinion: are they the more difficult to create, or the (other) beings We have created? Them have We created out of a sticky clay!

verses.content: بَلْ عَجِبْتَ وَيَسْخَرُونَ
verses.translation: Truly dost thou marvel, while they ridicule,

verses.content: وَإِذَا ذُكِّرُوا لَا يَذْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: And, when they are admonished, pay no heed,-

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَوْا آيَةً يَسْتَسْخِرُونَ
verses.translation: And, when they see a Sign, turn it to mockery,

verses.content: وَقَالُوا إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And say, "This is nothing but evident sorcery!

verses.content: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: "What! when we die, and become dust and bones, shall we (then) be raised up (again)

verses.content: أَوَآبَاؤُنَا الْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.translation: "And also our fathers of old?"

verses.content: قُلْ نَعَمْ وَأَنتُمْ دَاخِرُونَ
verses.translation: Say thou: "Yea, and ye shall then be humiliated (on account of your evil)."

verses.content: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: Then it will be a single (compelling) cry; and behold, they will begin to see!

verses.content: وَقَالُوا يَا وَيْلَنَا هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: They will say, "Ah! Woe to us! This is the Day of Judgment!"

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: (A voice will say,) "This is the Day of Sorting Out, whose truth ye (once) denied!"

verses.content: احْشُرُوا الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا وَأَزْوَاجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا يَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: "Bring ye up", it shall be said, "The wrong-doers and their wives, and the things they worshipped-

verses.content: مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ فَاهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَاطِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: "Besides Allah, and lead them to the Way to the (Fierce) Fire!

verses.content: وَقِفُوهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُم مَّسْئُولُونَ
verses.translation: "But stop them, for they must be asked:

verses.content: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنَاصَرُونَ
verses.translation: "'What is the matter with you that ye help not each other?'"

verses.content: بَلْ هُمُ الْيَوْمَ مُسْتَسْلِمُونَ
verses.translation: Nay, but that day they shall submit (to Judgment);

verses.content: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: And they will turn to one another, and question one another.

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: They will say: "It was ye who used to come to us from the right hand (of power and authority)!"

verses.content: قَالُوا بَل لَّمْ تَكُونُوا مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: They will reply: "Nay, ye yourselves had no Faith!

verses.content: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُم مِّن سُلْطَانٍ ۖ بَلْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًا طَاغِينَ
verses.translation: "Nor had we any authority over you. Nay, it was ye who were a people in obstinate rebellion!

verses.content: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَا ۖ إِنَّا لَذَائِقُونَ
verses.translation: "So now has been proved true, against us, the word of our Lord that we shall indeed (have to) taste (the punishment of our sins).

verses.content: فَأَغْوَيْنَاكُمْ إِنَّا كُنَّا غَاوِينَ
verses.translation: "We led you astray: for truly we were ourselves astray."

verses.content: فَإِنَّهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ فِي الْعَذَابِ مُشْتَرِكُونَ
verses.translation: Truly, that Day, they will (all) share in the Penalty.

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: Verily that is how We shall deal with Sinners.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ
verses.translation: For they, when they were told that there is no god except Allah, would puff themselves up with Pride,

verses.content: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُو آلِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍ مَّجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: And say: "What! shall we give up our gods for the sake of a Poet possessed?"

verses.content: بَلْ جَاءَ بِالْحَقِّ وَصَدَّقَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Nay! he has come with the (very) Truth, and he confirms (the Message of) the messengers (before him).

verses.content: إِنَّكُمْ لَذَائِقُو الْعَذَابِ الْأَلِيمِ
verses.translation: Ye shall indeed taste of the Grievous Penalty;-

verses.content: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: But it will be no more than the retribution of (the Evil) that ye have wrought;-

verses.content: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: But the sincere (and devoted) Servants of Allah,-

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ لَهُمْ رِزْقٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
verses.translation: For them is a Sustenance determined,

verses.content: فَوَاكِهُ ۖ وَهُم مُّكْرَمُونَ
verses.translation: Fruits (Delights); and they (shall enjoy) honour and dignity,

verses.content: فِي جَنَّاتِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: In Gardens of Felicity,

verses.content: عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مُّتَقَابِلِينَ
verses.translation: Facing each other on Thrones (of Dignity):

verses.content: يُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِكَأْسٍ مِّن مَّعِينٍ
verses.translation: Round will be passed to them a Cup from a clear-flowing fountain,

verses.content: بَيْضَاءَ لَذَّةٍ لِّلشَّارِبِينَ
verses.translation: Crystal-white, of a taste delicious to those who drink (thereof),

verses.content: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنزَفُونَ
verses.translation: Free from headiness; nor will they suffer intoxication therefrom.

verses.content: وَعِندَهُمْ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ عِينٌ
verses.translation: And besides them will be chaste women, restraining their glances, with big eyes (of wonder and beauty).

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُنَّ بَيْضٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
verses.translation: As if they were (delicate) eggs closely guarded.

verses.content: فَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: Then they will turn to one another and question one another.

verses.content: قَالَ قَائِلٌ مِّنْهُمْ إِنِّي كَانَ لِي قَرِينٌ
verses.translation: One of them will start the talk and say: "I had an intimate companion (on the earth),

verses.content: يَقُولُ أَإِنَّكَ لَمِنَ الْمُصَدِّقِينَ
verses.translation: "Who used to say, 'what! art thou amongst those who bear witness to the Truth (of the Message)?

verses.content: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَامًا أَإِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ
verses.translation: "'When we die and become dust and bones, shall we indeed receive rewards and punishments?'"

verses.content: قَالَ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّطَّلِعُونَ
verses.translation: (A voice) said: "Would ye like to look down?"

verses.content: فَاطَّلَعَ فَرَآهُ فِي سَوَاءِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: He looked down and saw him in the midst of the Fire.

verses.content: قَالَ تَاللَّهِ إِن كِدتَّ لَتُرْدِينِ
verses.translation: He said: "By Allah! thou wast little short of bringing me to perdition!

verses.content: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّي لَكُنتُ مِنَ الْمُحْضَرِينَ
verses.translation: "Had it not been for the Grace of my Lord, I should certainly have been among those brought (there)!

verses.content: أَفَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَيِّتِينَ
verses.translation: "Is it (the case) that we shall not die,

verses.content: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا الْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.translation: "Except our first death, and that we shall not be punished?"

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيمُ
verses.translation: Verily this is the supreme achievement!

verses.content: لِمِثْلِ هَـٰذَا فَلْيَعْمَلِ الْعَامِلُونَ
verses.translation: For the like of this let all strive, who wish to strive.

verses.content: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ الزَّقُّومِ
verses.translation: Is that the better entertainment or the Tree of Zaqqum?

verses.content: إِنَّا جَعَلْنَاهَا فِتْنَةً لِّلظَّالِمِينَ
verses.translation: For We have truly made it (as) a trial for the wrong-doers.

verses.content: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِي أَصْلِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: For it is a tree that springs out of the bottom of Hell-Fire:

verses.content: طَلْعُهَا كَأَنَّهُ رُءُوسُ الشَّيَاطِينِ
verses.translation: The shoots of its fruit-stalks are like the heads of devils:

verses.content: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَآكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِئُونَ مِنْهَا الْبُطُونَ
verses.translation: Truly they will eat thereof and fill their bellies therewith.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ
verses.translation: Then on top of that they will be given a mixture made of boiling water.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ مَرْجِعَهُمْ لَإِلَى الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Then shall their return be to the (Blazing) Fire.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ أَلْفَوْا آبَاءَهُمْ ضَالِّينَ
verses.translation: Truly they found their fathers on the wrong Path;

verses.content: فَهُمْ عَلَىٰ آثَارِهِمْ يُهْرَعُونَ
verses.translation: So they (too) were rushed down on their footsteps!

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ ضَلَّ قَبْلَهُمْ أَكْثَرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: And truly before them, many of the ancients went astray;-

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا فِيهِم مُّنذِرِينَ
verses.translation: But We sent aforetime, among them, (messengers) to admonish them;-

verses.content: فَانظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.translation: Then see what was the end of those who were admonished (but heeded not),-

verses.content: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: Except the sincere (and devoted) Servants of Allah.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ نَادَانَا نُوحٌ فَلَنِعْمَ الْمُجِيبُونَ
verses.translation: (In the days of old), Noah cried to Us, and We are the best to hear prayer.

verses.content: وَنَجَّيْنَاهُ وَأَهْلَهُ مِنَ الْكَرْبِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: And We delivered him and his people from the Great Calamity,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُ هُمُ الْبَاقِينَ
verses.translation: And made his progeny to endure (on this earth);

verses.content: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And We left (this blessing) for him among generations to come in later times:

verses.content: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ نُوحٍ فِي الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: "Peace and salutation to Noah among the nations!"

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Thus indeed do we reward those who do right.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: For he was one of our believing Servants.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا الْآخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Then the rest we overwhelmed in the Flood.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ مِن شِيعَتِهِ لَإِبْرَاهِيمَ
verses.translation: Verily among those who followed his Way was Abraham.

verses.content: إِذْ جَاءَ رَبَّهُ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: Behold! he approached his Lord with a sound heart.

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: Behold! he said to his father and to his people, "What is that which ye worship?

verses.content: أَئِفْكًا آلِهَةً دُونَ اللَّهِ تُرِيدُونَ
verses.translation: "Is it a falsehood- gods other than Allah- that ye desire?

verses.content: فَمَا ظَنُّكُم بِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: "Then what is your idea about the Lord of the worlds?"

verses.content: فَنَظَرَ نَظْرَةً فِي النُّجُومِ
verses.translation: Then did he cast a glance at the Stars.

verses.content: فَقَالَ إِنِّي سَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: And he said, "I am indeed sick (at heart)!"

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّوْا عَنْهُ مُدْبِرِينَ
verses.translation: So they turned away from him, and departed.

verses.content: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰ آلِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: Then did he turn to their gods and said, "will ye not eat (of the offerings before you)?...

verses.content: مَا لَكُمْ لَا تَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: "What is the matter with you that ye speak not (intelligently)?"

verses.content: فَرَاغَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضَرْبًا بِالْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: Then did he turn upon them, striking (them) with the right hand.

verses.content: فَأَقْبَلُوا إِلَيْهِ يَزِفُّونَ
verses.translation: Then came (the worshippers) with hurried steps, and faced (him).

verses.content: قَالَ أَتَعْبُدُونَ مَا تَنْحِتُونَ
verses.translation: He said: "Worship ye that which ye have (yourselves) carved?

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمْ وَمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: "But Allah has created you and your handwork!"

verses.content: قَالُوا ابْنُوا لَهُ بُنْيَانًا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِي الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: They said, "Build him a furnace, and throw him into the blazing fire!"

verses.content: فَأَرَادُوا بِهِ كَيْدًا فَجَعَلْنَاهُمُ الْأَسْفَلِينَ
verses.translation: (This failing), they then sought a stratagem against him, but We made them the ones most humiliated!

verses.content: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهْدِينِ
verses.translation: He said: "I will go to my Lord! He will surely guide me!

verses.content: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
verses.translation: "O my Lord! Grant me a righteous (son)!"

verses.content: فَبَشَّرْنَاهُ بِغُلَامٍ حَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: So We gave him the good news of a boy ready to suffer and forbear.

verses.content: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ السَّعْيَ قَالَ يَا بُنَيَّ إِنِّي أَرَىٰ فِي الْمَنَامِ أَنِّي أَذْبَحُكَ فَانظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ ۚ قَالَ يَا أَبَتِ افْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ ۖ سَتَجِدُنِي إِن شَاءَ اللَّهُ مِنَ الصَّابِرِينَ
verses.translation: Then, when (the son) reached (the age of) (serious) work with him, he said: "O my son! I see in vision that I offer thee in sacrifice: Now see what is thy view!" (The son) said: "O my father! Do as thou art commanded: thou will find me, if Allah so wills one practising Patience and Constancy!"

verses.content: فَلَمَّا أَسْلَمَا وَتَلَّهُ لِلْجَبِينِ
verses.translation: So when they had both submitted their wills (to Allah), and he had laid him prostrate on his forehead (for sacrifice),

verses.content: وَنَادَيْنَاهُ أَن يَا إِبْرَاهِيمُ
verses.translation: We called out to him "O Abraham!

verses.content: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ الرُّؤْيَا ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: "Thou hast already fulfilled the vision!" - thus indeed do We reward those who do right.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ الْبَلَاءُ الْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: For this was obviously a trial-

verses.content: وَفَدَيْنَاهُ بِذِبْحٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: And We ransomed him with a momentous sacrifice:

verses.content: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And We left (this blessing) for him among generations (to come) in later times:

verses.content: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ
verses.translation: "Peace and salutation to Abraham!"

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Thus indeed do We reward those who do right.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: For he was one of our believing Servants.

verses.content: وَبَشَّرْنَاهُ بِإِسْحَاقَ نَبِيًّا مِّنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
verses.translation: And We gave him the good news of Isaac - a prophet,- one of the Righteous.

verses.content: وَبَارَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰ إِسْحَاقَ ۚ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌ وَظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِ مُبِينٌ
verses.translation: We blessed him and Isaac: but of their progeny are (some) that do right, and (some) that obviously do wrong, to their own souls.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَارُونَ
verses.translation: Again (of old) We bestowed Our favour on Moses and Aaron,

verses.content: وَنَجَّيْنَاهُمَا وَقَوْمَهُمَا مِنَ الْكَرْبِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: And We delivered them and their people from (their) Great Calamity;

verses.content: وَنَصَرْنَاهُمْ فَكَانُوا هُمُ الْغَالِبِينَ
verses.translation: And We helped them, so they overcame (their troubles);

verses.content: وَآتَيْنَاهُمَا الْكِتَابَ الْمُسْتَبِينَ
verses.translation: And We gave them the Book which helps to make things clear;

verses.content: وَهَدَيْنَاهُمَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ
verses.translation: And We guided them to the Straight Way.

verses.content: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِمَا فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And We left (this blessing) for them among generations (to come) in later times:

verses.content: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَارُونَ
verses.translation: "Peace and salutation to Moses and Aaron!"

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Thus indeed do We reward those who do right.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: For they were two of our believing Servants.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ إِلْيَاسَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: So also was Elias among those sent (by Us).

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: Behold, he said to his people, "Will ye not fear (Allah)?

verses.content: أَتَدْعُونَ بَعْلًا وَتَذَرُونَ أَحْسَنَ الْخَالِقِينَ
verses.translation: "Will ye call upon Baal and forsake the Best of Creators,-

verses.content: اللَّهَ رَبَّكُمْ وَرَبَّ آبَائِكُمُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: "Allah, your Lord and Cherisher and the Lord and Cherisher of your fathers of old?"

verses.content: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَإِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: But they rejected him, and they will certainly be called up (for punishment),-

verses.content: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: Except the sincere and devoted Servants of Allah (among them).

verses.content: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And We left (this blessing) for him among generations (to come) in later times:

verses.content: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ إِلْ يَاسِينَ
verses.translation: "Peace and salutation to such as Elias!"

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Thus indeed do We reward those who do right.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: For he was one of our believing Servants.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لُوطًا لَّمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: So also was Lut among those sent (by Us).

verses.content: إِذْ نَجَّيْنَاهُ وَأَهْلَهُ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: Behold, We delivered him and his adherents, all

verses.content: إِلَّا عَجُوزًا فِي الْغَابِرِينَ
verses.translation: Except an old woman who was among those who lagged behind:

verses.content: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا الْآخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Then We destroyed the rest.

verses.content: وَإِنَّكُمْ لَتَمُرُّونَ عَلَيْهِم مُّصْبِحِينَ
verses.translation: Verily, ye pass by their (sites), by day-

verses.content: وَبِاللَّيْلِ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: And by night: will ye not understand?

verses.content: وَإِنَّ يُونُسَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: So also was Jonah among those sent (by Us).

verses.content: إِذْ أَبَقَ إِلَى الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ
verses.translation: When he ran away (like a slave from captivity) to the ship (fully) laden,

verses.content: فَسَاهَمَ فَكَانَ مِنَ الْمُدْحَضِينَ
verses.translation: He (agreed to) cast lots, and he was condemned:

verses.content: فَالْتَقَمَهُ الْحُوتُ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Then the big Fish did swallow him, and he had done acts worthy of blame.

verses.content: فَلَوْلَا أَنَّهُ كَانَ مِنَ الْمُسَبِّحِينَ
verses.translation: Had it not been that he (repented and) glorified Allah,

verses.content: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطْنِهِ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: He would certainly have remained inside the Fish till the Day of Resurrection.

verses.content: فَنَبَذْنَاهُ بِالْعَرَاءِ وَهُوَ سَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: But We cast him forth on the naked shore in a state of sickness,

verses.content: وَأَنبَتْنَا عَلَيْهِ شَجَرَةً مِّن يَقْطِينٍ
verses.translation: And We caused to grow, over him, a spreading plant of the gourd kind.

verses.content: وَأَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ مِائَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ
verses.translation: And We sent him (on a mission) to a hundred thousand (men) or more.

verses.content: فَآمَنُوا فَمَتَّعْنَاهُمْ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: And they believed; so We permitted them to enjoy (their life) for a while.

verses.content: فَاسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَلِرَبِّكَ الْبَنَاتُ وَلَهُمُ الْبَنُونَ
verses.translation: Now ask them their opinion: Is it that thy Lord has (only) daughters, and they have sons?-

verses.content: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا الْمَلَائِكَةَ إِنَاثًا وَهُمْ شَاهِدُونَ
verses.translation: Or that We created the angels female, and they are witnesses (thereto)?

verses.content: أَلَا إِنَّهُم مِّنْ إِفْكِهِمْ لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.translation: Is it not that they say, from their own invention,

verses.content: وَلَدَ اللَّهُ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَاذِبُونَ
verses.translation: "Allah has begotten children"? but they are liars!

verses.content: أَصْطَفَى الْبَنَاتِ عَلَى الْبَنِينَ
verses.translation: Did He (then) choose daughters rather than sons?

verses.content: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
verses.translation: What is the matter with you? How judge ye?

verses.content: أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: Will ye not then receive admonition?

verses.content: أَمْ لَكُمْ سُلْطَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Or have ye an authority manifest?

verses.content: فَأْتُوا بِكِتَابِكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: Then bring ye your Book (of authority) if ye be truthful!

verses.content: وَجَعَلُوا بَيْنَهُ وَبَيْنَ الْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ الْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
verses.translation: And they have invented a blood-relationship between Him and the Jinns: but the Jinns know (quite well) that they have indeed to appear (before his Judgment-Seat)!

verses.content: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.translation: Glory to Allah! (He is free) from the things they ascribe (to Him)!

verses.content: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: Not (so do) the Servants of Allah, sincere and devoted.

verses.content: فَإِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: For, verily, neither ye nor those ye worship-

verses.content: مَا أَنتُمْ عَلَيْهِ بِفَاتِنِينَ
verses.translation: Can lead (any) into temptation concerning Allah,

verses.content: إِلَّا مَنْ هُوَ صَالِ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Except such as are (themselves) going to the blazing Fire!

verses.content: وَمَا مِنَّا إِلَّا لَهُ مَقَامٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
verses.translation: (Those ranged in ranks say): "Not one of us but has a place appointed;

verses.content: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ الصَّافُّونَ
verses.translation: "And we are verily ranged in ranks (for service);

verses.content: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ الْمُسَبِّحُونَ
verses.translation: "And we are verily those who declare (Allah's) glory!"

verses.content: وَإِن كَانُوا لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.translation: And there were those who said,

verses.content: لَوْ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكْرًا مِّنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: "If only we had had before us a Message from those of old,

verses.content: لَكُنَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: "We should certainly have been Servants of Allah, sincere (and devoted)!"

verses.content: فَكَفَرُوا بِهِ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: But (now that the Qur'an has come), they reject it: But soon will they know!

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ سَبَقَتْ كَلِمَتُنَا لِعِبَادِنَا الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Already has Our Word been passed before (this) to our Servants sent (by Us),

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ لَهُمُ الْمَنصُورُونَ
verses.translation: That they would certainly be assisted,

verses.content: وَإِنَّ جُندَنَا لَهُمُ الْغَالِبُونَ
verses.translation: And that Our forces,- they surely must conquer.

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: So turn thou away from them for a little while,

verses.content: وَأَبْصِرْهُمْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And watch them (how they fare), and they soon shall see (how thou farest)!

verses.content: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.translation: Do they wish (indeed) to hurry on our Punishment?

verses.content: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَاءَ صَبَاحُ الْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.translation: But when it descends into the open space before them, evil will be the morning for those who were warned (and heeded not)!

verses.content: وَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: So turn thou away from them for a little while,

verses.content: وَأَبْصِرْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And watch (how they fare) and they soon shall see (how thou farest)!

verses.content: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ الْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.translation: Glory to thy Lord, the Lord of Honour and Power! (He is free) from what they ascribe (to Him)!

verses.content: وَسَلَامٌ عَلَى الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And Peace on the messengers!

verses.content: وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: And Praise to Allah, the Lord and Cherisher of the Worlds.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ ص ۚ وَالْقُرْآنِ ذِي الذِّكْرِ
verses.translation: Sad: By the Qur'an, Full of Admonition: (This is the Truth).

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ
verses.translation: But the Unbelievers (are steeped) in self-glory and Separatism.

verses.content: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍ فَنَادَوا وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍ
verses.translation: How many generations before them did We destroy? In the end they cried (for mercy)- when there was no longer time for being saved!

verses.content: وَعَجِبُوا أَن جَاءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ الْكَافِرُونَ هَـٰذَا سَاحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ
verses.translation: So they wonder that a Warner has come to them from among themselves! and the Unbelievers say, "This is a sorcerer telling lies!

verses.content: أَجَعَلَ الْآلِهَةَ إِلَـٰهًا وَاحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَيْءٌ عُجَابٌ
verses.translation: "Has he made the gods (all) into one Allah? Truly this is a wonderful thing!"

verses.content: وَانطَلَقَ الْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ امْشُوا وَاصْبِرُوا عَلَىٰ آلِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَيْءٌ يُرَادُ
verses.translation: And the leader among them go away (impatiently), (saying), "Walk ye away, and remain constant to your gods! For this is truly a thing designed (against you)!

verses.content: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِي الْمِلَّةِ الْآخِرَةِ إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا اخْتِلَاقٌ
verses.translation: "We never heard (the like) of this among the people of these latter days: this is nothing but a made-up tale!"

verses.content: أَأُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ الذِّكْرُ مِن بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِي شَكٍّ مِّن ذِكْرِي ۖ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُوا عَذَابِ
verses.translation: "What! has the Message been sent to him - (Of all persons) among us?"... but they are in doubt concerning My (Own) Message! Nay, they have not yet tasted My Punishment!

verses.content: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَائِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ الْعَزِيزِ الْوَهَّابِ
verses.translation: Or have they the treasures of the mercy of thy Lord,- the Exalted in Power, the Grantor of Bounties without measure?

verses.content: أَمْ لَهُم مُّلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا فِي الْأَسْبَابِ
verses.translation: Or have they the dominion of the heavens and the earth and all between? If so, let them mount up with the ropes and means (to reach that end)!

verses.content: جُندٌ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌ مِّنَ الْأَحْزَابِ
verses.translation: But there - will be put to flight even a host of confederates.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو الْأَوْتَادِ
verses.translation: Before them (were many who) rejected messengers,- the people of Noah, and 'Ad, and Pharaoh, the Lord of Stakes,

verses.content: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ الْأَحْزَابُ
verses.translation: And Thamud, and the people of Lut, and the Companions of the Wood; - such were the Confederates.

verses.content: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
verses.translation: Not one (of them) but rejected the messengers, but My punishment came justly and inevitably (on them).

verses.content: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٍ
verses.translation: These (today) only wait for a single mighty Blast, which (when it comes) will brook no delay.

verses.content: وَقَالُوا رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: They say: "Our Lord! hasten to us our sentence (even) before the Day of Account!"

verses.content: اصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَاذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُودَ ذَا الْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: Have patience at what they say, and remember our servant David, the man of strength: for he ever turned (to Allah).

verses.content: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا الْجِبَالَ مَعَهُ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِالْعَشِيِّ وَالْإِشْرَاقِ
verses.translation: It was We that made the hills declare, in unison with him, Our Praises, at eventide and at break of day,

verses.content: وَالطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةً ۖ كُلٌّ لَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: And the birds gathered (in assemblies): all with him did turn (to Allah).

verses.content: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُ وَآتَيْنَاهُ الْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ الْخِطَابِ
verses.translation: We strengthened his kingdom, and gave him wisdom and sound judgment in speech and decision.

verses.content: وَهَلْ أَتَاكَ نَبَأُ الْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا الْمِحْرَابَ
verses.translation: Has the Story of the Disputants reached thee? Behold, they climbed over the wall of the private chamber;

verses.content: إِذْ دَخَلُوا عَلَىٰ دَاوُودَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ فَاحْكُم بَيْنَنَا بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَاهْدِنَا إِلَىٰ سَوَاءِ الصِّرَاطِ
verses.translation: When they entered the presence of David, and he was terrified of them, they said: "Fear not: we are two disputants, one of whom has wronged the other: Decide now between us with truth, and treat us not with injustice, but guide us to the even Path..

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا أَخِي لَهُ تِسْعٌ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةً وَلِيَ نَعْجَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِي فِي الْخِطَابِ
verses.translation: "This man is my brother: He has nine and ninety ewes, and I have (but) one: Yet he says, 'commit her to my care,' and is (moreover) harsh to me in speech."

verses.content: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ الْخُلَطَاءِ لَيَبْغِي بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَقَلِيلٌ مَّا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُودُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّاهُ فَاسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًا وَأَنَابَ ۩
verses.translation: (David) said: "He has undoubtedly wronged thee in demanding thy (single) ewe to be added to his (flock of) ewes: truly many are the partners (in business) who wrong each other: Not so do those who believe and work deeds of righteousness, and how few are they?"... and David gathered that We had tried him: he asked forgiveness of his Lord, fell down, bowing (in prostration), and turned (to Allah in repentance).

verses.content: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
verses.translation: So We forgave him this (lapse): he enjoyed, indeed, a Near Approach to Us, and a beautiful place of (Final) Return.

verses.content: يَا دَاوُودُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَاكَ خَلِيفَةً فِي الْأَرْضِ فَاحْكُم بَيْنَ النَّاسِ بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ الْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ بِمَا نَسُوا يَوْمَ الْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: O David! We did indeed make thee a vicegerent on earth: so judge thou between men in truth (and justice): Nor follow thou the lusts (of thy heart), for they will mislead thee from the Path of Allah: for those who wander astray from the Path of Allah, is a Penalty Grievous, for that they forget the Day of Account.

verses.content: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاءَ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَاطِلًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنَ النَّارِ
verses.translation: Not without purpose did We create heaven and earth and all between! that were the thought of Unbelievers! but woe to the Unbelievers because of the Fire (of Hell)!

verses.content: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ كَالْمُفْسِدِينَ فِي الْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ الْمُتَّقِينَ كَالْفُجَّارِ
verses.translation: Shall We treat those who believe and work deeds of righteousness, the same as those who do mischief on earth? Shall We treat those who guard against evil, the same as those who turn aside from the right?

verses.content: كِتَابٌ أَنزَلْنَاهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَارَكٌ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوا آيَاتِهِ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُولُو الْأَلْبَابِ
verses.translation: (Here is) a Book which We have sent down unto thee, full of blessings, that they may mediate on its Signs, and that men of understanding may receive admonition.

verses.content: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُودَ سُلَيْمَانَ ۚ نِعْمَ الْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: To David We gave Solomon (for a son),- How excellent in Our service! Ever did he turn (to Us)!

verses.content: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِالْعَشِيِّ الصَّافِنَاتُ الْجِيَادُ
verses.translation: Behold, there were brought before him, at eventide coursers of the highest breeding, and swift of foot;

verses.content: فَقَالَ إِنِّي أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ الْخَيْرِ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّي حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِالْحِجَابِ
verses.translation: And he said, "Truly do I love the love of good, with a view to the glory of my Lord,"- until (the sun) was hidden in the veil (of night):

verses.content: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًا بِالسُّوقِ وَالْأَعْنَاقِ
verses.translation: "Bring them back to me." then began he to pass his hand over (their) legs and their necks.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَانَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِ جَسَدًا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
verses.translation: And We did try Solomon: We placed on his throne a body (without life); but he did turn (to Us in true devotion):

verses.content: قَالَ رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَهَبْ لِي مُلْكًا لَّا يَنبَغِي لِأَحَدٍ مِّن بَعْدِي ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الْوَهَّابُ
verses.translation: He said, "O my Lord! Forgive me, and grant me a kingdom which, (it may be), suits not another after me: for Thou art the Grantor of Bounties (without measure).

verses.content: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ الرِّيحَ تَجْرِي بِأَمْرِهِ رُخَاءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ
verses.translation: Then We subjected the wind to his power, to flow gently to his order, Whithersoever he willed,-

verses.content: وَالشَّيَاطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّاءٍ وَغَوَّاصٍ
verses.translation: As also the evil ones, (including) every kind of builder and diver,-

verses.content: وَآخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِي الْأَصْفَادِ
verses.translation: As also others bound together in fetters.

verses.content: هَـٰذَا عَطَاؤُنَا فَامْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
verses.translation: "Such are Our Bounties: whether thou bestow them (on others) or withhold them, no account will be asked."

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
verses.translation: And he enjoyed, indeed, a Near Approach to Us, and a beautiful Place of (Final) Return.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ الشَّيْطَانُ بِنُصْبٍ وَعَذَابٍ
verses.translation: Commemorate Our Servant Job. Behold he cried to his Lord: "The Evil One has afflicted me with distress and suffering!"

verses.content: ارْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَـٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌ بَارِدٌ وَشَرَابٌ
verses.translation: (The command was given:) "Strike with thy foot: here is (water) wherein to wash, cool and refreshing, and (water) to drink."

verses.content: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُ أَهْلَهُ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ
verses.translation: And We gave him (back) his people, and doubled their number,- as a Grace from Ourselves, and a thing for commemoration, for all who have Understanding.

verses.content: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًا فَاضْرِب بِّهِ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَاهُ صَابِرًا ۚ نِّعْمَ الْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
verses.translation: "And take in thy hand a little grass, and strike therewith: and break not (thy oath)." Truly We found him full of patience and constancy. How excellent in Our service! ever did he turn (to Us)!

verses.content: وَاذْكُرْ عِبَادَنَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَإِسْحَاقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُولِي الْأَيْدِي وَالْأَبْصَارِ
verses.translation: And commemorate Our Servants Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, possessors of Power and Vision.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَخْلَصْنَاهُم بِخَالِصَةٍ ذِكْرَى الدَّارِ
verses.translation: Verily We did choose them for a special (purpose)- proclaiming the Message of the Hereafter.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِندَنَا لَمِنَ الْمُصْطَفَيْنَ الْأَخْيَارِ
verses.translation: They were, in Our sight, truly, of the company of the Elect and the Good.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرْ إِسْمَاعِيلَ وَالْيَسَعَ وَذَا الْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّ مِّنَ الْأَخْيَارِ
verses.translation: And commemorate Isma'il, Elisha, and Zul-Kifl: Each of them was of the Company of the Good.

verses.content: هَـٰذَا ذِكْرٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
verses.translation: This is a Message (of admonition): and verily, for the righteous, is a beautiful Place of (Final) Return,-

verses.content: جَنَّاتِ عَدْنٍ مُّفَتَّحَةً لَّهُمُ الْأَبْوَابُ
verses.translation: Gardens of Eternity, whose doors will (ever) be open to them;

verses.content: مُتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَاكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ وَشَرَابٍ
verses.translation: Therein will they recline (at ease): Therein can they call (at pleasure) for fruit in abundance, and (delicious) drink;

verses.content: وَعِندَهُمْ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ
verses.translation: And beside them will be chaste women restraining their glances, (companions) of equal age.

verses.content: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ
verses.translation: Such is the Promise made, to you for the Day of Account!

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُ مِن نَّفَادٍ
verses.translation: Truly such will be Our Bounty (to you); it will never fail;-

verses.content: هَـٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّاغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَآبٍ
verses.translation: Yea, such! but - for the wrong-doers will be an evil place of (Final) Return!-

verses.content: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ الْمِهَادُ
verses.translation: Hell!- they will burn therein, - an evil bed (indeed, to lie on)!-

verses.content: هَـٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌ وَغَسَّاقٌ
verses.translation: Yea, such! - then shall they taste it,- a boiling fluid, and a fluid dark, murky, intensely cold!-

verses.content: وَآخَرُ مِن شَكْلِهِ أَزْوَاجٌ
verses.translation: And other Penalties of a similar kind, to match them!

verses.content: هَـٰذَا فَوْجٌ مُّقْتَحِمٌ مَّعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُو النَّارِ
verses.translation: Here is a troop rushing headlong with you! No welcome for them! truly, they shall burn in the Fire!

verses.content: قَالُوا بَلْ أَنتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ الْقَرَارُ
verses.translation: (The followers shall cry to the misleaders:) "Nay, ye (too)! No welcome for you! It is ye who have brought this upon us! Now evil is (this) place to stay in!"

verses.content: قَالُوا رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَـٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا فِي النَّارِ
verses.translation: They will say: "Our Lord! whoever brought this upon us,- Add to him a double Penalty in the Fire!"

verses.content: وَقَالُوا مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ الْأَشْرَارِ
verses.translation: And they will say: "What has happened to us that we see not men whom we used to number among the bad ones?

verses.content: أَتَّخَذْنَاهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ الْأَبْصَارُ
verses.translation: "Did we treat them (as such) in ridicule, or have (our) eyes failed to perceive them?"

verses.content: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ النَّارِ
verses.translation: Truly that is just and fitting,- the mutual recriminations of the People of the Fire!

verses.content: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَنَا مُنذِرٌ ۖ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ إِلَّا اللَّهُ الْوَاحِدُ الْقَهَّارُ
verses.translation: Say: "Truly am I a Warner: no god is there but the one Allah, Supreme and Irresistible,-

verses.content: رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفَّارُ
verses.translation: "The Lord of the heavens and the earth, and all between,- Exalted in Might, able to enforce His Will, forgiving again and again."

verses.content: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَأٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: Say: "That is a Message Supreme (above all),-

verses.content: أَنتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ
verses.translation: "From which ye do turn away!

verses.content: مَا كَانَ لِيَ مِنْ عِلْمٍ بِالْمَلَإِ الْأَعْلَىٰ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
verses.translation: "No knowledge have I of the Chiefs on high, when they discuss (matters) among themselves.

verses.content: إِن يُوحَىٰ إِلَيَّ إِلَّا أَنَّمَا أَنَا نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: 'Only this has been revealed to me: that I am to give warning plainly and publicly."

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ إِنِّي خَالِقٌ بَشَرًا مِّن طِينٍ
verses.translation: Behold, thy Lord said to the angels: "I am about to create man from clay:

verses.content: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِي فَقَعُوا لَهُ سَاجِدِينَ
verses.translation: "When I have fashioned him (in due proportion) and breathed into him of My spirit, fall ye down in obeisance unto him."

verses.content: فَسَجَدَ الْمَلَائِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
verses.translation: So the angels prostrated themselves, all of them together:

verses.content: إِلَّا إِبْلِيسَ اسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ
verses.translation: Not so Iblis: he was haughty, and became one of those who reject Faith.

verses.content: قَالَ يَا إِبْلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسْجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقْتُ بِيَدَيَّ ۖ أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ الْعَالِينَ
verses.translation: (Allah) said: "O Iblis! What prevents thee from prostrating thyself to one whom I have created with my hands? Art thou haughty? Or art thou one of the high (and mighty) ones?"

verses.content: قَالَ أَنَا خَيْرٌ مِّنْهُ ۖ خَلَقْتَنِي مِن نَّارٍ وَخَلَقْتَهُ مِن طِينٍ
verses.translation: (Iblis) said: "I am better than he: thou createdst me from fire, and him thou createdst from clay."

verses.content: قَالَ فَاخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ
verses.translation: (Allah) said: "Then get thee out from here: for thou art rejected, accursed.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِي إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: "And My curse shall be on thee till the Day of Judgment."

verses.content: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِي إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: (Iblis) said: "O my Lord! Give me then respite till the Day the (dead) are raised."

verses.content: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ الْمُنظَرِينَ
verses.translation: (Allah) said: "Respite then is granted thee-

verses.content: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ الْوَقْتِ الْمَعْلُومِ
verses.translation: "Till the Day of the Time Appointed."

verses.content: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: (Iblis) said: "Then, by Thy power, I will put them all in the wrong,-

verses.content: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.translation: "Except Thy Servants amongst them, sincere and purified (by Thy Grace)."

verses.content: قَالَ فَالْحَقُّ وَالْحَقَّ أَقُولُ
verses.translation: (Allah) said: "Then it is just and fitting- and I say what is just and fitting-

verses.content: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: "That I will certainly fill Hell with thee and those that follow thee,- every one."

verses.content: قُلْ مَا أَسْأَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ وَمَا أَنَا مِنَ الْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ
verses.translation: Say: "No reward do I ask of you for this (Qur'an), nor am I a pretender.

verses.content: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: "This is no less than a Message to (all) the Worlds.

verses.content: وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُ بَعْدَ حِينٍ
verses.translation: "And ye shall certainly know the truth of it (all) after a while."

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ تَنزِيلُ الْكِتَابِ مِنَ اللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَكِيمِ
verses.translation: The revelation of this Book is from Allah, the Exalted in Power, full of Wisdom.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَنزَلْنَا إِلَيْكَ الْكِتَابَ بِالْحَقِّ فَاعْبُدِ اللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُ الدِّينَ
verses.translation: Verily it is We Who have revealed the Book to thee in Truth: so serve Allah, offering Him sincere devotion.

verses.content: أَلَا لِلَّهِ الدِّينُ الْخَالِصُ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ اتَّخَذُوا مِن دُونِهِ أَوْلِيَاءَ مَا نَعْبُدُهُمْ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُونَا إِلَى اللَّهِ زُلْفَىٰ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ فِي مَا هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِي مَنْ هُوَ كَاذِبٌ كَفَّارٌ
verses.translation: Is it not to Allah that sincere devotion is due? But those who take for protectors other than Allah (say): "We only serve them in order that they may bring us nearer to Allah." Truly Allah will judge between them in that wherein they differ. But Allah guides not such as are false and ungrateful.

verses.content: لَّوْ أَرَادَ اللَّهُ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا لَّاصْطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَاءُ ۚ سُبْحَانَهُ ۖ هُوَ اللَّهُ الْوَاحِدُ الْقَهَّارُ
verses.translation: Had Allah wished to take to Himself a son, He could have chosen whom He pleased out of those whom He doth create: but Glory be to Him! (He is above such things.) He is Allah, the One, the Irresistible.

verses.content: خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ بِالْحَقِّ ۖ يُكَوِّرُ اللَّيْلَ عَلَى النَّهَارِ وَيُكَوِّرُ النَّهَارَ عَلَى اللَّيْلِ ۖ وَسَخَّرَ الشَّمْسَ وَالْقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّ يَجْرِي لِأَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۗ أَلَا هُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفَّارُ
