verses.translation: If He were to ask you for all of them, and press you, ye would covetously withhold, and He would bring out all your ill-feeling.

verses.content: هَا أَنتُمْ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ تُدْعَوْنَ لِتُنفِقُوا فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ فَمِنكُم مَّن يَبْخَلُ ۖ وَمَن يَبْخَلْ فَإِنَّمَا يَبْخَلُ عَن نَّفْسِهِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ الْغَنِيُّ وَأَنتُمُ الْفُقَرَاءُ ۚ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوْا يَسْتَبْدِلْ قَوْمًا غَيْرَكُمْ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُونُوا أَمْثَالَكُم
verses.translation: Behold, ye are those invited to spend (of your substance) in the Way of Allah: But among you are some that are niggardly. But any who are niggardly are so at the expense of their own souls. But Allah is free of all wants, and it is ye that are needy. If ye turn back (from the Path), He will substitute in your stead another people; then they would not be like you!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا فَتَحْنَا لَكَ فَتْحًا مُّبِينًا
verses.translation: Verily We have granted thee a manifest Victory:

verses.content: لِّيَغْفِرَ لَكَ اللَّهُ مَا تَقَدَّمَ مِن ذَنبِكَ وَمَا تَأَخَّرَ وَيُتِمَّ نِعْمَتَهُ عَلَيْكَ وَيَهْدِيَكَ صِرَاطًا مُّسْتَقِيمًا
verses.translation: That Allah may forgive thee thy faults of the past and those to follow; fulfil His favour to thee; and guide thee on the Straight Way;

verses.content: وَيَنصُرَكَ اللَّهُ نَصْرًا عَزِيزًا
verses.translation: And that Allah may help thee with powerful help.

verses.content: هُوَ الَّذِي أَنزَلَ السَّكِينَةَ فِي قُلُوبِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ لِيَزْدَادُوا إِيمَانًا مَّعَ إِيمَانِهِمْ ۗ وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.translation: It is He Who sent down tranquillity into the hearts of the Believers, that they may add faith to their faith;- for to Allah belong the Forces of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is Full of Knowledge and Wisdom;-

verses.content: لِّيُدْخِلَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا وَيُكَفِّرَ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّئَاتِهِمْ ۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عِندَ اللَّهِ فَوْزًا عَظِيمًا
verses.translation: That He may admit the men and women who believe, to Gardens beneath which rivers flow, to dwell therein for aye, and remove their ills from them;- and that is, in the sight of Allah, the highest achievement (for man),-

verses.content: وَيُعَذِّبَ الْمُنَافِقِينَ وَالْمُنَافِقَاتِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ وَالْمُشْرِكَاتِ الظَّانِّينَ بِاللَّهِ ظَنَّ السَّوْءِ ۚ عَلَيْهِمْ دَائِرَةُ السَّوْءِ ۖ وَغَضِبَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَعَنَهُمْ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمْ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَسَاءَتْ مَصِيرًا
verses.translation: And that He may punish the Hypocrites, men and women, and the Polytheists men and women, who imagine an evil opinion of Allah. On them is a round of Evil: the Wrath of Allah is on them: He has cursed them and got Hell ready for them: and evil is it for a destination.

verses.content: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا
verses.translation: For to Allah belong the Forces of the heavens and the earth; and Allah is Exalted in Power, Full of Wisdom.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَاكَ شَاهِدًا وَمُبَشِّرًا وَنَذِيرًا
verses.translation: We have truly sent thee as a witness, as a bringer of Glad Tidings, and as a Warner:

verses.content: لِّتُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ وَتُعَزِّرُوهُ وَتُوَقِّرُوهُ وَتُسَبِّحُوهُ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.translation: In order that ye (O men) may believe in Allah and His Messenger, that ye may assist and honour Him, and celebrate His praise morning and evening.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يُبَايِعُونَكَ إِنَّمَا يُبَايِعُونَ اللَّهَ يَدُ اللَّهِ فَوْقَ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۚ فَمَن نَّكَثَ فَإِنَّمَا يَنكُثُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ ۖ وَمَنْ أَوْفَىٰ بِمَا عَاهَدَ عَلَيْهُ اللَّهَ فَسَيُؤْتِيهِ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًا
verses.translation: Verily those who plight their fealty to thee do no less than plight their fealty to Allah: the Hand of Allah is over their hands: then any one who violates his oath, does so to the harm of his own soul, and any one who fulfils what he has covenanted with Allah,- Allah will soon grant him a great Reward.

verses.content: سَيَقُولُ لَكَ الْمُخَلَّفُونَ مِنَ الْأَعْرَابِ شَغَلَتْنَا أَمْوَالُنَا وَأَهْلُونَا فَاسْتَغْفِرْ لَنَا ۚ يَقُولُونَ بِأَلْسِنَتِهِم مَّا لَيْسَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ ۚ قُلْ فَمَن يَمْلِكُ لَكُم مِّنَ اللَّهِ شَيْئًا إِنْ أَرَادَ بِكُمْ ضَرًّا أَوْ أَرَادَ بِكُمْ نَفْعًا ۚ بَلْ كَانَ اللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرًا
verses.translation: The desert Arabs who lagged behind will say to thee: "We were engaged in (looking after) our flocks and herds, and our families: do thou then ask forgiveness for us." They say with their tongues what is not in their hearts. Say: "Who then has any power at all (to intervene) on your behalf with Allah, if His Will is to give you some loss or to give you some profit? But Allah is well acquainted with all that ye do.

verses.content: بَلْ ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَنقَلِبَ الرَّسُولُ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِيهِمْ أَبَدًا وَزُيِّنَ ذَٰلِكَ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ وَظَنَنتُمْ ظَنَّ السَّوْءِ وَكُنتُمْ قَوْمًا بُورًا
verses.translation: "Nay, ye thought that the Messenger and the Believers would never return to their families; this seemed pleasing in your hearts, and ye conceived an evil thought, for ye are a people lost (in wickedness)."

verses.content: وَمَن لَّمْ يُؤْمِن بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ فَإِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَافِرِينَ سَعِيرًا
verses.translation: And if any believe not in Allah and His Messenger, We have prepared, for those who reject Allah, a Blazing Fire!

verses.content: وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ يَغْفِرُ لِمَن يَشَاءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
verses.translation: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth: He forgives whom He wills, and He punishes whom He wills: but Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

verses.content: سَيَقُولُ الْمُخَلَّفُونَ إِذَا انطَلَقْتُمْ إِلَىٰ مَغَانِمَ لِتَأْخُذُوهَا ذَرُونَا نَتَّبِعْكُمْ ۖ يُرِيدُونَ أَن يُبَدِّلُوا كَلَامَ اللَّهِ ۚ قُل لَّن تَتَّبِعُونَا كَذَٰلِكُمْ قَالَ اللَّهُ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ فَسَيَقُولُونَ بَلْ تَحْسُدُونَنَا ۚ بَلْ كَانُوا لَا يَفْقَهُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًا
verses.translation: Those who lagged behind (will say), when ye (are free to) march and take booty (in war): "Permit us to follow you." They wish to change Allah's decree: Say: "Not thus will ye follow us: Allah has already declared (this) beforehand": then they will say, "But ye are jealous of us." Nay, but little do they understand (such things).

verses.content: قُل لِّلْمُخَلَّفِينَ مِنَ الْأَعْرَابِ سَتُدْعَوْنَ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ أُولِي بَأْسٍ شَدِيدٍ تُقَاتِلُونَهُمْ أَوْ يُسْلِمُونَ ۖ فَإِن تُطِيعُوا يُؤْتِكُمُ اللَّهُ أَجْرًا حَسَنًا ۖ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوْا كَمَا تَوَلَّيْتُم مِّن قَبْلُ يُعَذِّبْكُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: Say to the desert Arabs who lagged behind: "Ye shall be summoned (to fight) against a people given to vehement war: then shall ye fight, or they shall submit. Then if ye show obedience, Allah will grant you a goodly reward, but if ye turn back as ye did before, He will punish you with a grievous Penalty."

verses.content: لَّيْسَ عَلَى الْأَعْمَىٰ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَى الْأَعْرَجِ حَرَجٌ وَلَا عَلَى الْمَرِيضِ حَرَجٌ ۗ وَمَن يُطِعِ اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ يُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۖ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ يُعَذِّبْهُ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: No blame is there on the blind, nor is there blame on the lame, nor on one ill (if he joins not the war): But he that obeys Allah and his Messenger,- (Allah) will admit him to Gardens beneath which rivers flow; and he who turns back, (Allah) will punish him with a grievous Penalty.

verses.content: لَّقَدْ رَضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ إِذْ يُبَايِعُونَكَ تَحْتَ الشَّجَرَةِ فَعَلِمَ مَا فِي قُلُوبِهِمْ فَأَنزَلَ السَّكِينَةَ عَلَيْهِمْ وَأَثَابَهُمْ فَتْحًا قَرِيبًا
verses.translation: Allah's Good Pleasure was on the Believers when they swore Fealty to thee under the Tree: He knew what was in their hearts, and He sent down Tranquillity to them; and He rewarded them with a speedy Victory;

verses.content: وَمَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةً يَأْخُذُونَهَا ۗ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا
verses.translation: And many gains will they acquire (besides): and Allah is Exalted in Power, Full of Wisdom.

verses.content: وَعَدَكُمُ اللَّهُ مَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةً تَأْخُذُونَهَا فَعَجَّلَ لَكُمْ هَـٰذِهِ وَكَفَّ أَيْدِيَ النَّاسِ عَنكُمْ وَلِتَكُونَ آيَةً لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَيَهْدِيَكُمْ صِرَاطًا مُّسْتَقِيمًا
verses.translation: Allah has promised you many gains that ye shall acquire, and He has given you these beforehand; and He has restrained the hands of men from you; that it may be a Sign for the Believers, and that He may guide you to a Straight Path;

verses.content: وَأُخْرَىٰ لَمْ تَقْدِرُوا عَلَيْهَا قَدْ أَحَاطَ اللَّهُ بِهَا ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرًا
verses.translation: And other gains (there are), which are not within your power, but which Allah has compassed: and Allah has power over all things.

verses.content: وَلَوْ قَاتَلَكُمُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لَوَلَّوُا الْأَدْبَارَ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيًّا وَلَا نَصِيرًا
verses.translation: If the Unbelievers should fight you, they would certainly turn their backs; then would they find neither protector nor helper.

verses.content: سُنَّةَ اللَّهِ الَّتِي قَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ اللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.translation: (Such has been) the practice (approved) of Allah already in the past: no change wilt thou find in the practice (approved) of Allah.

verses.content: وَهُوَ الَّذِي كَفَّ أَيْدِيَهُمْ عَنكُمْ وَأَيْدِيَكُمْ عَنْهُم بِبَطْنِ مَكَّةَ مِن بَعْدِ أَنْ أَظْفَرَكُمْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: And it is He Who has restrained their hands from you and your hands from them in the midst of Makka, after that He gave you the victory over them. And Allah sees well all that ye do.

verses.content: هُمُ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا وَصَدُّوكُمْ عَنِ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ وَالْهَدْيَ مَعْكُوفًا أَن يَبْلُغَ مَحِلَّهُ ۚ وَلَوْلَا رِجَالٌ مُّؤْمِنُونَ وَنِسَاءٌ مُّؤْمِنَاتٌ لَّمْ تَعْلَمُوهُمْ أَن تَطَئُوهُمْ فَتُصِيبَكُم مِّنْهُم مَّعَرَّةٌ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ ۖ لِّيُدْخِلَ اللَّهُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ لَوْ تَزَيَّلُوا لَعَذَّبْنَا الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: They are the ones who denied Revelation and hindered you from the Sacred Mosque and the sacrificial animals, detained from reaching their place of sacrifice. Had there not been believing men and believing women whom ye did not know that ye were trampling down and on whose account a crime would have accrued to you without (your) knowledge, (Allah would have allowed you to force your way, but He held back your hands) that He may admit to His Mercy whom He will. If they had been apart, We should certainly have punished the Unbelievers among them with a grievous Punishment.

verses.content: إِذْ جَعَلَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ الْحَمِيَّةَ حَمِيَّةَ الْجَاهِلِيَّةِ فَأَنزَلَ اللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِ وَعَلَى الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَأَلْزَمَهُمْ كَلِمَةَ التَّقْوَىٰ وَكَانُوا أَحَقَّ بِهَا وَأَهْلَهَا ۚ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمًا
verses.translation: While the Unbelievers got up in their hearts heat and cant - the heat and cant of ignorance,- Allah sent down His Tranquillity to his Messenger and to the Believers, and made them stick close to the command of self-restraint; and well were they entitled to it and worthy of it. And Allah has full knowledge of all things.

verses.content: لَّقَدْ صَدَقَ اللَّهُ رَسُولَهُ الرُّؤْيَا بِالْحَقِّ ۖ لَتَدْخُلُنَّ الْمَسْجِدَ الْحَرَامَ إِن شَاءَ اللَّهُ آمِنِينَ مُحَلِّقِينَ رُءُوسَكُمْ وَمُقَصِّرِينَ لَا تَخَافُونَ ۖ فَعَلِمَ مَا لَمْ تَعْلَمُوا فَجَعَلَ مِن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ فَتْحًا قَرِيبًا
verses.translation: Truly did Allah fulfil the vision for His Messenger: ye shall enter the Sacred Mosque, if Allah wills, with minds secure, heads shaved, hair cut short, and without fear. For He knew what ye knew not, and He granted, besides this, a speedy victory.

verses.content: هُوَ الَّذِي أَرْسَلَ رَسُولَهُ بِالْهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ الْحَقِّ لِيُظْهِرَهُ عَلَى الدِّينِ كُلِّهِ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِاللَّهِ شَهِيدًا
verses.translation: It is He Who has sent His Messenger with Guidance and the Religion of Truth, to proclaim it over all religion: and enough is Allah for a Witness.

verses.content: مُّحَمَّدٌ رَّسُولُ اللَّهِ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ مَعَهُ أَشِدَّاءُ عَلَى الْكُفَّارِ رُحَمَاءُ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ تَرَاهُمْ رُكَّعًا سُجَّدًا يَبْتَغُونَ فَضْلًا مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَرِضْوَانًا ۖ سِيمَاهُمْ فِي وُجُوهِهِم مِّنْ أَثَرِ السُّجُودِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ مَثَلُهُمْ فِي التَّوْرَاةِ ۚ وَمَثَلُهُمْ فِي الْإِنجِيلِ كَزَرْعٍ أَخْرَجَ شَطْأَهُ فَآزَرَهُ فَاسْتَغْلَظَ فَاسْتَوَىٰ عَلَىٰ سُوقِهِ يُعْجِبُ الزُّرَّاعَ لِيَغِيظَ بِهِمُ الْكُفَّارَ ۗ وَعَدَ اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ مِنْهُم مَّغْفِرَةً وَأَجْرًا عَظِيمًا
verses.translation: Muhammad is the messenger of Allah; and those who are with him are strong against Unbelievers, (but) compassionate amongst each other. Thou wilt see them bow and prostrate themselves (in prayer), seeking Grace from Allah and (His) Good Pleasure. On their faces are their marks, (being) the traces of their prostration. This is their similitude in the Taurat; and their similitude in the Gospel is: like a seed which sends forth its blade, then makes it strong; it then becomes thick, and it stands on its own stem, (filling) the sowers with wonder and delight. As a result, it fills the Unbelievers with rage at them. Allah has promised those among them who believe and do righteous deeds forgiveness, and a great Reward.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تُقَدِّمُوا بَيْنَ يَدَيِ اللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ۖ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: O Ye who believe! Put not yourselves forward before Allah and His Messenger; but fear Allah: for Allah is He Who hears and knows all things.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا تَرْفَعُوا أَصْوَاتَكُمْ فَوْقَ صَوْتِ النَّبِيِّ وَلَا تَجْهَرُوا لَهُ بِالْقَوْلِ كَجَهْرِ بَعْضِكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ أَن تَحْبَطَ أَعْمَالُكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: O ye who believe! Raise not your voices above the voice of the Prophet, nor speak aloud to him in talk, as ye may speak aloud to one another, lest your deeds become vain and ye perceive not.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَغُضُّونَ أَصْوَاتَهُمْ عِندَ رَسُولِ اللَّهِ أُولَـٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ امْتَحَنَ اللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُمْ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ ۚ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَأَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: Those that lower their voices in the presence of Allah's Messenger,- their hearts has Allah tested for piety: for them is Forgiveness and a great Reward.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَاءِ الْحُجُرَاتِ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: Those who shout out to thee from without the inner apartments - most of them lack understanding.

verses.content: وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ صَبَرُوا حَتَّىٰ تَخْرُجَ إِلَيْهِمْ لَكَانَ خَيْرًا لَّهُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: If only they had patience until thou couldst come out to them, it would be best for them: but Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِن جَاءَكُمْ فَاسِقٌ بِنَبَإٍ فَتَبَيَّنُوا أَن تُصِيبُوا قَوْمًا بِجَهَالَةٍ فَتُصْبِحُوا عَلَىٰ مَا فَعَلْتُمْ نَادِمِينَ
verses.translation: O ye who believe! If a wicked person comes to you with any news, ascertain the truth, lest ye harm people unwittingly, and afterwards become full of repentance for what ye have done.

verses.content: وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ فِيكُمْ رَسُولَ اللَّهِ ۚ لَوْ يُطِيعُكُمْ فِي كَثِيرٍ مِّنَ الْأَمْرِ لَعَنِتُّمْ وَلَـٰكِنَّ اللَّهَ حَبَّبَ إِلَيْكُمُ الْإِيمَانَ وَزَيَّنَهُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ وَكَرَّهَ إِلَيْكُمُ الْكُفْرَ وَالْفُسُوقَ وَالْعِصْيَانَ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الرَّاشِدُونَ
verses.translation: And know that among you is Allah's Messenger: were he, in many matters, to follow your (wishes), ye would certainly fall into misfortune: But Allah has endeared the Faith to you, and has made it beautiful in your hearts, and He has made hateful to you Unbelief, wickedness, and rebellion: such indeed are those who walk in righteousness;-

verses.content: فَضْلًا مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَنِعْمَةً ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
verses.translation: A Grace and Favour from Allah; and Allah is full of Knowledge and Wisdom.

verses.content: وَإِن طَائِفَتَانِ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ اقْتَتَلُوا فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَإِن بَغَتْ إِحْدَاهُمَا عَلَى الْأُخْرَىٰ فَقَاتِلُوا الَّتِي تَبْغِي حَتَّىٰ تَفِيءَ إِلَىٰ أَمْرِ اللَّهِ ۚ فَإِن فَاءَتْ فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَهُمَا بِالْعَدْلِ وَأَقْسِطُوا ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ الْمُقْسِطِينَ
verses.translation: If two parties among the Believers fall into a quarrel, make ye peace between them: but if one of them transgresses beyond bounds against the other, then fight ye (all) against the one that transgresses until it complies with the command of Allah; but if it complies, then make peace between them with justice, and be fair: for Allah loves those who are fair (and just).

verses.content: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِخْوَةٌ فَأَصْلِحُوا بَيْنَ أَخَوَيْكُمْ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.translation: The Believers are but a single Brotherhood: So make peace and reconciliation between your two (contending) brothers; and fear Allah, that ye may receive Mercy.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لَا يَسْخَرْ قَوْمٌ مِّن قَوْمٍ عَسَىٰ أَن يَكُونُوا خَيْرًا مِّنْهُمْ وَلَا نِسَاءٌ مِّن نِّسَاءٍ عَسَىٰ أَن يَكُنَّ خَيْرًا مِّنْهُنَّ ۖ وَلَا تَلْمِزُوا أَنفُسَكُمْ وَلَا تَنَابَزُوا بِالْأَلْقَابِ ۖ بِئْسَ الِاسْمُ الْفُسُوقُ بَعْدَ الْإِيمَانِ ۚ وَمَن لَّمْ يَتُبْ فَأُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الظَّالِمُونَ
verses.translation: O ye who believe! Let not some men among you laugh at others: It may be that the (latter) are better than the (former): Nor let some women laugh at others: It may be that the (latter are better than the (former): Nor defame nor be sarcastic to each other, nor call each other by (offensive) nicknames: Ill-seeming is a name connoting wickedness, (to be used of one) after he has believed: And those who do not desist are (indeed) doing wrong.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اجْتَنِبُوا كَثِيرًا مِّنَ الظَّنِّ إِنَّ بَعْضَ الظَّنِّ إِثْمٌ ۖ وَلَا تَجَسَّسُوا وَلَا يَغْتَب بَّعْضُكُم بَعْضًا ۚ أَيُحِبُّ أَحَدُكُمْ أَن يَأْكُلَ لَحْمَ أَخِيهِ مَيْتًا فَكَرِهْتُمُوهُ ۚ وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ تَوَّابٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: O ye who believe! Avoid suspicion as much (as possible): for suspicion in some cases is a sin: And spy not on each other behind their backs. Would any of you like to eat the flesh of his dead brother? Nay, ye would abhor it... But fear Allah: For Allah is Oft-Returning, Most Merciful.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَاكُم مِّن ذَكَرٍ وَأُنثَىٰ وَجَعَلْنَاكُمْ شُعُوبًا وَقَبَائِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوا ۚ إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِندَ اللَّهِ أَتْقَاكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: O mankind! We created you from a single (pair) of a male and a female, and made you into nations and tribes, that ye may know each other (not that ye may despise (each other). Verily the most honoured of you in the sight of Allah is (he who is) the most righteous of you. And Allah has full knowledge and is well acquainted (with all things).

verses.content: قَالَتِ الْأَعْرَابُ آمَنَّا ۖ قُل لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا وَلَـٰكِن قُولُوا أَسْلَمْنَا وَلَمَّا يَدْخُلِ الْإِيمَانُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُوا اللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ لَا يَلِتْكُم مِّنْ أَعْمَالِكُمْ شَيْئًا ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: The desert Arabs say, "We believe." Say, "Ye have no faith; but ye (only) say, 'We have submitted our wills to Allah,' For not yet has Faith entered your hearts. But if ye obey Allah and His Messenger, He will not belittle aught of your deeds: for Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful."

verses.content: إِنَّمَا الْمُؤْمِنُونَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَرْتَابُوا وَجَاهَدُوا بِأَمْوَالِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الصَّادِقُونَ
verses.translation: Only those are Believers who have believed in Allah and His Messenger, and have never since doubted, but have striven with their belongings and their persons in the Cause of Allah: Such are the sincere ones.

verses.content: قُلْ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ اللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمْ وَاللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Say: "What! Will ye instruct Allah about your religion? But Allah knows all that is in the heavens and on earth: He has full knowledge of all things.

verses.content: يَمُنُّونَ عَلَيْكَ أَنْ أَسْلَمُوا ۖ قُل لَّا تَمُنُّوا عَلَيَّ إِسْلَامَكُم ۖ بَلِ اللَّهُ يَمُنُّ عَلَيْكُمْ أَنْ هَدَاكُمْ لِلْإِيمَانِ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: They impress on thee as a favour that they have embraced Islam. Say, "Count not your Islam as a favour upon me: Nay, Allah has conferred a favour upon you that He has guided you to the faith, if ye be true and sincere.

verses.content: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ غَيْبَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ بَصِيرٌ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: "Verily Allah knows the secrets of the heavens and the earth: and Allah Sees well all that ye do."

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ ق ۚ وَالْقُرْآنِ الْمَجِيدِ
verses.translation: Qaf: By the Glorious Qur'an (Thou art Allah's Messenger).

verses.content: بَلْ عَجِبُوا أَن جَاءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ الْكَافِرُونَ هَـٰذَا شَيْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
verses.translation: But they wonder that there has come to them a Warner from among themselves. So the Unbelievers say: "This is a wonderful thing!

verses.content: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌ بَعِيدٌ
verses.translation: "What! When we die and become dust, (shall we live again?) That is a (sort of) return far (from our understanding)."

verses.content: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ الْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَابٌ حَفِيظٌ
verses.translation: We already know how much of them the earth takes away: With Us is a record guarding (the full account).

verses.content: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا بِالْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِي أَمْرٍ مَّرِيجٍ
verses.translation: But they deny the Truth when it comes to them: so they are in a confused state.

verses.content: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوا إِلَى السَّمَاءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَاهَا وَزَيَّنَّاهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍ
verses.translation: Do they not look at the sky above them?- How We have made it and adorned it, and there are no flaws in it?

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَاهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ وَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ بَهِيجٍ
verses.translation: And the earth- We have spread it out, and set thereon mountains standing firm, and produced therein every kind of beautiful growth (in pairs)-

verses.content: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.translation: To be observed and commemorated by every devotee turning (to Allah).

verses.content: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً مُّبَارَكًا فَأَنبَتْنَا بِهِ جَنَّاتٍ وَحَبَّ الْحَصِيدِ
verses.translation: And We send down from the sky rain charted with blessing, and We produce therewith gardens and Grain for harvests;

verses.content: وَالنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَاتٍ لَّهَا طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ
verses.translation: And tall (and stately) palm-trees, with shoots of fruit-stalks, piled one over another;-

verses.content: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ الْخُرُوجُ
verses.translation: As sustenance for (Allah's) Servants;- and We give (new) life therewith to land that is dead: Thus will be the Resurrection.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَابُ الرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
verses.translation: Before them was denied (the Hereafter) by the People of Noah, the Companions of the Rass, the Thamud,

verses.content: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَانُ لُوطٍ
verses.translation: The 'Ad, Pharaoh, the brethren of Lut,

verses.content: وَأَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: The Companions of the Wood, and the People of Tubba'; each one (of them) rejected the messengers, and My warning was duly fulfilled (in them).

verses.content: أَفَعَيِينَا بِالْخَلْقِ الْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِي لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.translation: Were We then weary with the first Creation, that they should be in confused doubt about a new Creation?

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِ نَفْسُهُ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ الْوَرِيدِ
verses.translation: It was We Who created man, and We know what dark suggestions his soul makes to him: for We are nearer to him than (his) jugular vein.

verses.content: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى الْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ الْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ الشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
verses.translation: Behold, two (guardian angels) appointed to learn (his doings) learn (and noted them), one sitting on the right and one on the left.

verses.content: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
verses.translation: Not a word does he utter but there is a sentinel by him, ready (to note it).

verses.content: وَجَاءَتْ سَكْرَةُ الْمَوْتِ بِالْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
verses.translation: And the stupor of death will bring Truth (before his eyes): "This was the thing which thou wast trying to escape!"

verses.content: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: And the Trumpet shall be blown: that will be the Day whereof Warning (had been given).

verses.content: وَجَاءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَائِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: And there will come forth every soul: with each will be an (angel) to drive, and an (angel) to bear witness.

verses.content: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِي غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَاءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ الْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: (It will be said:) "Thou wast heedless of this; now have We removed thy veil, and sharp is thy sight this Day!"

verses.content: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُ هَـٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ
verses.translation: And his Companion will say: "Here is (his Record) ready with me!"

verses.content: أَلْقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
verses.translation: (The sentence will be:) "Throw, throw into Hell every contumacious Rejecter (of Allah)!-

verses.content: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ
verses.translation: "Who forbade what was good, transgressed all bounds, cast doubts and suspicions;

verses.content: الَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا آخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِي الْعَذَابِ الشَّدِيدِ
verses.translation: "Who set up another god beside Allah: Throw him into a severe penalty."

verses.content: قَالَ قَرِينُهُ رَبَّنَا مَا أَطْغَيْتُهُ وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ فِي ضَلَالٍ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: His Companion will say: "Our Lord! I did not make him transgress, but he was (himself) far astray."

verses.content: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا لَدَيَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِالْوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: He will say: "Dispute not with each other in My Presence: I had already in advance sent you Warning.

verses.content: مَا يُبَدَّلُ الْقَوْلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَا أَنَا بِظَلَّامٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
verses.translation: "The Word changes not before Me, and I do not the least injustice to My Servants."

verses.content: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ امْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ
verses.translation: One Day We will ask Hell, "Art thou filled to the full?" It will say, "Are there any more (to come)?"

verses.content: وَأُزْلِفَتِ الْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: And the Garden will be brought nigh to the Righteous,- no more a thing distant.

verses.content: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
verses.translation: (A voice will say:) "This is what was promised for you,- for every one who turned (to Allah) in sincere repentance, who kept (His Law),

verses.content: مَّنْ خَشِيَ الرَّحْمَـٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَجَاءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.translation: "Who feared (Allah) Most Gracious Unseen, and brought a heart turned in devotion (to Him):

verses.content: ادْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَامٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُلُودِ
verses.translation: "Enter ye therein in Peace and Security; this is a Day of Eternal Life!"

verses.content: لَهُم مَّا يَشَاءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
verses.translation: There will be for them therein all that they wish,- and more besides in Our Presence.

verses.content: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا فِي الْبِلَادِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
verses.translation: But how many generations before them did We destroy (for their sins),- stronger in power than they? Then did they wander through the land: was there any place of escape (for them)?

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى السَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: Verily in this is a Message for any that has a heart and understanding or who gives ear and earnestly witnesses (the truth).

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ
verses.translation: We created the heavens and the earth and all between them in Six Days, nor did any sense of weariness touch Us.

verses.content: فَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ الشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ الْغُرُوبِ
verses.translation: Bear, then, with patience, all that they say, and celebrate the praises of thy Lord, before the rising of the sun and before (its) setting.

verses.content: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَارَ السُّجُودِ
verses.translation: And during part of the night, (also,) celebrate His praises, and (so likewise) after the postures of adoration.

verses.content: وَاسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ الْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
verses.translation: And listen for the Day when the Caller will call out from a place quiet near,-

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ الصَّيْحَةَ بِالْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُرُوجِ
verses.translation: The Day when they will hear a (mighty) Blast in (very) truth: that will be the Day of Resurrection.

verses.content: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Verily it is We Who give Life and Death; and to Us is the Final Goal-

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ الْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: The Day when the Earth will be rent asunder, from (men) hurrying out: that will be a gathering together,- quite easy for Us.

verses.content: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَا أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِالْقُرْآنِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: We know best what they say; and thou art not one to overawe them by force. So admonish with the Qur'an such as fear My Warning!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالذَّارِيَاتِ ذَرْوًا
verses.translation: By the (Winds) that scatter broadcast;

verses.content: فَالْحَامِلَاتِ وِقْرًا
verses.translation: And those that lift and bear away heavy weights;

verses.content: فَالْجَارِيَاتِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: And those that flow with ease and gentleness;

verses.content: فَالْمُقَسِّمَاتِ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: And those that distribute and apportion by Command;-

verses.content: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌ
verses.translation: Verily that which ye are promised is true;

verses.content: وَإِنَّ الدِّينَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.translation: And verily Judgment and Justice must indeed come to pass.

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْحُبُكِ
verses.translation: By the Sky with (its) numerous Paths,

verses.content: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِي قَوْلٍ مُّخْتَلِفٍ
verses.translation: Truly ye are in a doctrine discordant,

verses.content: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ
verses.translation: Through which are deluded (away from the Truth) such as would be deluded.

verses.content: قُتِلَ الْخَرَّاصُونَ
verses.translation: Woe to the falsehood-mongers,-

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ فِي غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: Those who (flounder) heedless in a flood of confusion:

verses.content: يَسْأَلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: They ask, "When will be the Day of Judgment and Justice?"

verses.content: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى النَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ
verses.translation: (It will be) a Day when they will be tried (and tested) over the Fire!

verses.content: ذُوقُوا فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَـٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.translation: "Taste ye your trial! This is what ye used to ask to be hastened!"

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: As to the Righteous, they will be in the midst of Gardens and Springs,

verses.content: آخِذِينَ مَا آتَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Taking joy in the things which their Lord gives them, because, before then, they lived a good life.

verses.content: كَانُوا قَلِيلًا مِّنَ اللَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: They were in the habit of sleeping but little by night,

verses.content: وَبِالْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ
verses.translation: And in the hour of early dawn, they (were found) praying for Forgiveness;

verses.content: وَفِي أَمْوَالِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّائِلِ وَالْمَحْرُومِ
verses.translation: And in their wealth and possessions (was remembered) the right of the (needy,) him who asked, and him who (for some reason) was prevented (from asking).

verses.content: وَفِي الْأَرْضِ آيَاتٌ لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ
verses.translation: On the earth are signs for those of assured Faith,

verses.content: وَفِي أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: As also in your own selves: Will ye not then see?

verses.content: وَفِي السَّمَاءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: And in heaven is your Sustenance, as (also) that which ye are promised.

verses.content: فَوَرَبِّ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُ لَحَقٌّ مِّثْلَ مَا أَنَّكُمْ تَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: Then, by the Lord of heaven and earth, this is the very Truth, as much as the fact that ye can speak intelligently to each other.

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ الْمُكْرَمِينَ
verses.translation: Has the story reached thee, of the honoured guests of Abraham?

verses.content: إِذْ دَخَلُوا عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا سَلَامًا ۖ قَالَ سَلَامٌ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ
verses.translation: Behold, they entered his presence, and said: "Peace!" He said, "Peace!" (and thought, "These seem) unusual people."

verses.content: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ فَجَاءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ
verses.translation: Then he turned quickly to his household, brought out a fatted calf,

verses.content: فَقَرَّبَهُ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ
verses.translation: And placed it before them.. he said, "Will ye not eat?"

verses.content: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَامٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: (When they did not eat), He conceived a fear of them. They said, "Fear not," and they gave him glad tidings of a son endowed with knowledge.

verses.content: فَأَقْبَلَتِ امْرَأَتُهُ فِي صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌ
verses.translation: But his wife came forward (laughing) aloud: she smote her forehead and said: "A barren old woman!"

verses.content: قَالُوا كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْحَكِيمُ الْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: They said, "Even so has thy Lord spoken: and He is full of Wisdom and Knowledge."

verses.content: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: (Abraham) said: "And what, O ye Messengers, is your errand (now)?"

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّا أُرْسِلْنَا إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: They said, "We have been sent to a people (deep) in sin;-

verses.content: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن طِينٍ
verses.translation: "To bring on, on them, (a shower of) stones of clay (brimstone),

verses.content: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.translation: "Marked as from thy Lord for those who trespass beyond bounds."

verses.content: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Then We evacuated those of the Believers who were there,

verses.content: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.translation: But We found not there any just (Muslim) persons except in one house:

verses.content: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَا آيَةً لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ الْعَذَابَ الْأَلِيمَ
verses.translation: And We left there a Sign for such as fear the Grievous Penalty.

verses.content: وَفِي مُوسَىٰ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: And in Moses (was another Sign): Behold, We sent him to Pharaoh, with authority manifest.

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِ وَقَالَ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: But (Pharaoh) turned back with his Chiefs, and said, "A sorcerer, or one possessed!"

verses.content: فَأَخَذْنَاهُ وَجُنُودَهُ فَنَبَذْنَاهُمْ فِي الْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
verses.translation: So We took him and his forces, and threw them into the sea; and his was the blame.

verses.content: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ الرِّيحَ الْعَقِيمَ
verses.translation: And in the 'Ad (people) (was another Sign): Behold, We sent against them the devastating Wind:

verses.content: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَيْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَالرَّمِيمِ
verses.translation: It left nothing whatever that it came up against, but reduced it to ruin and rottenness.

verses.content: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
verses.translation: And in the Thamud (was another Sign): Behold, they were told, "Enjoy (your brief day) for a little while!"

verses.content: فَعَتَوْا عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ الصَّاعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: But they insolently defied the Command of their Lord: So the stunning noise (of an earthquake) seized them, even while they were looking on.

verses.content: فَمَا اسْتَطَاعُوا مِن قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا مُنتَصِرِينَ
verses.translation: Then they could not even stand (on their feet), nor could they help themselves.

verses.content: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَوْمًا فَاسِقِينَ
verses.translation: So were the People of Noah before them for they wickedly transgressed.

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءَ بَنَيْنَاهَا بِأَيْدٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
verses.translation: With power and skill did We construct the Firmament: for it is We Who create the vastness of pace.

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَاهَا فَنِعْمَ الْمَاهِدُونَ
verses.translation: And We have spread out the (spacious) earth: How excellently We do spread out!

verses.content: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: And of every thing We have created pairs: That ye may receive instruction.

verses.content: فَفِرُّوا إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Hasten ye then (at once) to Allah: I am from Him a Warner to you, clear and open!

verses.content: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا آخَرَ ۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And make not another an object of worship with Allah: I am from Him a Warner to you, clear and open!

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ مَا أَتَى الَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: Similarly, no messenger came to the Peoples before them, but they said (of him) in like manner, "A sorcerer, or one possessed"!

verses.content: أَتَوَاصَوْا بِهِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: Is this the legacy they have transmitted, one to another? Nay, they are themselves a people transgressing beyond bounds!

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَا أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍ
verses.translation: So turn away from them: not thine is the blame.

verses.content: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ الذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: But teach (thy Message) for teaching benefits the Believers.

verses.content: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ الْجِنَّ وَالْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
verses.translation: I have only created Jinns and men, that they may serve Me.

verses.content: مَا أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍ وَمَا أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ
verses.translation: No Sustenance do I require of them, nor do I require that they should feed Me.

verses.content: إِنَّ اللَّهَ هُوَ الرَّزَّاقُ ذُو الْقُوَّةِ الْمَتِينُ
verses.translation: For Allah is He Who gives (all) Sustenance,- Lord of Power,- Steadfast (for ever).

verses.content: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا ذَنُوبًا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَابِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
verses.translation: For the Wrong-doers, their portion is like unto the portion of their fellows (of earlier generations): then let them not ask Me to hasten (that portion)!

verses.content: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِن يَوْمِهِمُ الَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: Woe, then, to the Unbelievers, on account of that Day of theirs which they have been promised!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالطُّورِ
verses.translation: By the Mount (of Revelation);

verses.content: وَكِتَابٍ مَّسْطُورٍ
verses.translation: By a Decree inscribed

verses.content: فِي رَقٍّ مَّنشُورٍ
verses.translation: In a Scroll unfolded;

verses.content: وَالْبَيْتِ الْمَعْمُورِ
verses.translation: By the much-frequented Fane;

verses.content: وَالسَّقْفِ الْمَرْفُوعِ
verses.translation: By the Canopy Raised High;

verses.content: وَالْبَحْرِ الْمَسْجُورِ
verses.translation: And by the Ocean filled with Swell;-

verses.content: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.translation: Verily, the Doom of thy Lord will indeed come to pass;-

verses.content: مَّا لَهُ مِن دَافِعٍ
verses.translation: There is none can avert it;-

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَمُورُ السَّمَاءُ مَوْرًا
verses.translation: On the Day when the firmament will be in dreadful commotion.

verses.content: وَتَسِيرُ الْجِبَالُ سَيْرًا
verses.translation: And the mountains will fly hither and thither.

verses.content: فَوَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Then woe that Day to those that treat (Truth) as Falsehood;-

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ فِي خَوْضٍ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.translation: That play (and paddle) in shallow trifles.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
verses.translation: That Day shall they be thrust down to the Fire of Hell, irresistibly.

verses.content: هَـٰذِهِ النَّارُ الَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: "This:, it will be said, "Is the Fire,- which ye were wont to deny!

verses.content: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَـٰذَا أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: "Is this then a fake, or is it ye that do not see?

verses.content: اصْلَوْهَا فَاصْبِرُوا أَوْ لَا تَصْبِرُوا سَوَاءٌ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا تُجْزَوْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: "Burn ye therein: the same is it to you whether ye bear it with patience, or not: Ye but receive the recompense of your (own) deeds."

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَنَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: As to the Righteous, they will be in Gardens, and in Happiness,-

verses.content: فَاكِهِينَ بِمَا آتَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ وَوَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ عَذَابَ الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Enjoying the (Bliss) which their Lord hath bestowed on them, and their Lord shall deliver them from the Penalty of the Fire.

verses.content: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: (To them will be said:) "Eat and drink ye, with profit and health, because of your (good) deeds."

verses.content: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَاهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.translation: They will recline (with ease) on Thrones (of dignity) arranged in ranks; and We shall join them to Companions, with beautiful big and lustrous eyes.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَاتَّبَعَتْهُمْ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَانٍ أَلْحَقْنَا بِهِمْ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمْ وَمَا أَلَتْنَاهُم مِّنْ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَيْءٍ ۚ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٌ
verses.translation: And those who believe and whose families follow them in Faith,- to them shall We join their families: Nor shall We deprive them (of the fruit) of aught of their works: (Yet) is each individual in pledge for his deeds.

verses.content: وَأَمْدَدْنَاهُم بِفَاكِهَةٍ وَلَحْمٍ مِّمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: And We shall bestow on them, of fruit and meat, anything they shall desire.

verses.content: يَتَنَازَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا لَّا لَغْوٌ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأْثِيمٌ
verses.translation: They shall there exchange, one with another, a (loving) cup free of frivolity, free of all taint of ill.

verses.content: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ غِلْمَانٌ لَّهُمْ كَأَنَّهُمْ لُؤْلُؤٌ مَّكْنُونٌ
verses.translation: Round about them will serve, (devoted) to them, young male servants (handsome) as Pearls well-guarded.

verses.content: وَأَقْبَلَ بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: They will advance to each other, engaging in mutual enquiry.

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبْلُ فِي أَهْلِنَا مُشْفِقِينَ
verses.translation: They will say: "Aforetime, we were not without fear for the sake of our people.

verses.content: فَمَنَّ اللَّهُ عَلَيْنَا وَوَقَانَا عَذَابَ السَّمُومِ
verses.translation: "But Allah has been good to us, and has delivered us from the Penalty of the Scorching Wind.

verses.content: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلُ نَدْعُوهُ ۖ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْبَرُّ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: "Truly, we did call unto Him from of old: truly it is He, the Beneficent, the Merciful!"

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ فَمَا أَنتَ بِنِعْمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٍ وَلَا مَجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: Therefore proclaim thou the praises (of thy Lord): for by the Grace of thy Lord, thou art no (vulgar) soothsayer, nor art thou one possessed.

verses.content: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٌ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِ رَيْبَ الْمَنُونِ
verses.translation: Or do they say:- "A Poet! we await for him some calamity (hatched) by Time!"

verses.content: قُلْ تَرَبَّصُوا فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ الْمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
verses.translation: Say thou: "Await ye!- I too will wait along with you!"

verses.content: أَمْ تَأْمُرُهُمْ أَحْلَامُهُم بِهَـٰذَا ۚ أَمْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ
verses.translation: Is it that their faculties of understanding urge them to this, or are they but a people transgressing beyond bounds?

verses.content: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُ ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they say, "He fabricated the (Message)"? Nay, they have no faith!

verses.content: فَلْيَأْتُوا بِحَدِيثٍ مِّثْلِهِ إِن كَانُوا صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: Let them then produce a recital like unto it,- If (it be) they speak the truth!

verses.content: أَمْ خُلِقُوا مِنْ غَيْرِ شَيْءٍ أَمْ هُمُ الْخَالِقُونَ
verses.translation: Were they created of nothing, or were they themselves the creators?

verses.content: أَمْ خَلَقُوا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
verses.translation: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Nay, they have no firm belief.

verses.content: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَائِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمْ هُمُ الْمُصَيْطِرُونَ
verses.translation: Or are the Treasures of thy Lord with them, or are they the managers (of affairs)?

verses.content: أَمْ لَهُمْ سُلَّمٌ يَسْتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ ۖ فَلْيَأْتِ مُسْتَمِعُهُم بِسُلْطَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Or have they a ladder, by which they can (climb up to heaven and) listen (to its secrets)? Then let (such a) listener of theirs produce a manifest proof.

verses.content: أَمْ لَهُ الْبَنَاتُ وَلَكُمُ الْبَنُونَ
verses.translation: Or has He only daughters and ye have sons?

verses.content: أَمْ تَسْأَلُهُمْ أَجْرًا فَهُم مِّن مَّغْرَمٍ مُّثْقَلُونَ
verses.translation: Or is it that thou dost ask for a reward, so that they are burdened with a load of debt?-

verses.content: أَمْ عِندَهُمُ الْغَيْبُ فَهُمْ يَكْتُبُونَ
verses.translation: Or that the Unseen in it their hands, and they write it down?

verses.content: أَمْ يُرِيدُونَ كَيْدًا ۖ فَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا هُمُ الْمَكِيدُونَ
verses.translation: Or do they intend a plot (against thee)? But those who defy Allah are themselves involved in a Plot!

verses.content: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.translation: Or have they a god other than Allah? Exalted is Allah far above the things they associate with Him!

verses.content: وَإِن يَرَوْا كِسْفًا مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ سَاقِطًا يَقُولُوا سَحَابٌ مَّرْكُومٌ
verses.translation: Were they to see a piece of the sky falling (on them), they would (only) say: "Clouds gathered in heaps!"

verses.content: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَاقُوا يَوْمَهُمُ الَّذِي فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ
verses.translation: So leave them alone until they encounter that Day of theirs, wherein they shall (perforce) swoon (with terror),-

verses.content: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُمْ كَيْدُهُمْ شَيْئًا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: The Day when their plotting will avail them nothing and no help shall be given them.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا عَذَابًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: And verily, for those who do wrong, there is another punishment besides this: But most of them understand not.

verses.content: وَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعْيُنِنَا ۖ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.translation: Now await in patience the command of thy Lord: for verily thou art in Our eyes: and celebrate the praises of thy Lord the while thou standest forth,

verses.content: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَإِدْبَارَ النُّجُومِ
verses.translation: And for part of the night also praise thou Him,- and at the retreat of the stars!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالنَّجْمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ
verses.translation: By the Star when it goes down,-

verses.content: مَا ضَلَّ صَاحِبُكُمْ وَمَا غَوَىٰ
verses.translation: Your Companion is neither astray nor being misled.

verses.content: وَمَا يَنطِقُ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ
verses.translation: Nor does he say (aught) of (his own) Desire.

verses.content: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا وَحْيٌ يُوحَىٰ
verses.translation: It is no less than inspiration sent down to him:

verses.content: عَلَّمَهُ شَدِيدُ الْقُوَىٰ
verses.translation: He was taught by one Mighty in Power,

verses.content: ذُو مِرَّةٍ فَاسْتَوَىٰ
verses.translation: Endued with Wisdom: for he appeared (in stately form);

verses.content: وَهُوَ بِالْأُفُقِ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: While he was in the highest part of the horizon:

verses.content: ثُمَّ دَنَا فَتَدَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Then he approached and came closer,

verses.content: فَكَانَ قَابَ قَوْسَيْنِ أَوْ أَدْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And was at a distance of but two bow-lengths or (even) nearer;

verses.content: فَأَوْحَىٰ إِلَىٰ عَبْدِهِ مَا أَوْحَىٰ
verses.translation: So did (Allah) convey the inspiration to His Servant- (conveyed) what He (meant) to convey.

verses.content: مَا كَذَبَ الْفُؤَادُ مَا رَأَىٰ
verses.translation: The (Prophet's) (mind and) heart in no way falsified that which he saw.

verses.content: أَفَتُمَارُونَهُ عَلَىٰ مَا يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: Will ye then dispute with him concerning what he saw?

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ نَزْلَةً أُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: For indeed he saw him at a second descent,

verses.content: عِندَ سِدْرَةِ الْمُنتَهَىٰ
verses.translation: Near the Lote-tree beyond which none may pass:

verses.content: عِندَهَا جَنَّةُ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Near it is the Garden of Abode.

verses.content: إِذْ يَغْشَى السِّدْرَةَ مَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.translation: Behold, the Lote-tree was shrouded (in mystery unspeakable!)

verses.content: مَا زَاغَ الْبَصَرُ وَمَا طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: (His) sight never swerved, nor did it go wrong!

verses.content: لَقَدْ رَأَىٰ مِنْ آيَاتِ رَبِّهِ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: For truly did he see, of the Signs of his Lord, the Greatest!

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتُمُ اللَّاتَ وَالْعُزَّىٰ
verses.translation: Have ye seen Lat. and 'Uzza,

verses.content: وَمَنَاةَ الثَّالِثَةَ الْأُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And another, the third (goddess), Manat?

verses.content: أَلَكُمُ الذَّكَرُ وَلَهُ الْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: What! for you the male sex, and for Him, the female?

verses.content: تِلْكَ إِذًا قِسْمَةٌ ضِيزَىٰ
verses.translation: Behold, such would be indeed a division most unfair!

verses.content: إِنْ هِيَ إِلَّا أَسْمَاءٌ سَمَّيْتُمُوهَا أَنتُمْ وَآبَاؤُكُم مَّا أَنزَلَ اللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلْطَانٍ ۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهْوَى الْأَنفُسُ ۖ وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُم مِّن رَّبِّهِمُ الْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: These are nothing but names which ye have devised,- ye and your fathers,- for which Allah has sent down no authority (whatever). They follow nothing but conjecture and what their own souls desire!- Even though there has already come to them Guidance from their Lord!

verses.content: أَمْ لِلْإِنسَانِ مَا تَمَنَّىٰ
verses.translation: Nay, shall man have (just) anything he hankers after?

verses.content: فَلِلَّهِ الْآخِرَةُ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: But it is to Allah that the End and the Beginning (of all things) belong.

verses.content: وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٍ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ لَا تُغْنِي شَفَاعَتُهُمْ شَيْئًا إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ أَن يَأْذَنَ اللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَاءُ وَيَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: How many-so-ever be the angels in the heavens, their intercession will avail nothing except after Allah has given leave for whom He pleases and that he is acceptable to Him.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْآخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ الْمَلَائِكَةَ تَسْمِيَةَ الْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: Those who believe not in the Hereafter, name the angels with female names.

verses.content: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِ مِنْ عِلْمٍ ۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا الظَّنَّ ۖ وَإِنَّ الظَّنَّ لَا يُغْنِي مِنَ الْحَقِّ شَيْئًا
verses.translation: But they have no knowledge therein. They follow nothing but conjecture; and conjecture avails nothing against Truth.

verses.content: فَأَعْرِضْ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكْرِنَا وَلَمْ يُرِدْ إِلَّا الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: Therefore shun those who turn away from Our Message and desire nothing but the life of this world.

verses.content: ذَٰلِكَ مَبْلَغُهُم مِّنَ الْعِلْمِ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ اهْتَدَىٰ
verses.translation: That is as far as knowledge will reach them. Verily thy Lord knoweth best those who stray from His Path, and He knoweth best those who receive guidance.

verses.content: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ لِيَجْزِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسَاءُوا بِمَا عَمِلُوا وَيَجْزِيَ الَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا بِالْحُسْنَى
verses.translation: Yea, to Allah belongs all that is in the heavens and on earth: so that He rewards those who do evil, according to their deeds, and He rewards those who do good, with what is best.

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَائِرَ الْإِثْمِ وَالْفَوَاحِشَ إِلَّا اللَّمَمَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَاسِعُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ ۚ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِكُمْ إِذْ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ الْأَرْضِ وَإِذْ أَنتُمْ أَجِنَّةٌ فِي بُطُونِ أُمَّهَاتِكُمْ ۖ فَلَا تُزَكُّوا أَنفُسَكُمْ ۖ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَنِ اتَّقَىٰ
verses.translation: Those who avoid great sins and shameful deeds, only (falling into) small faults,- verily thy Lord is ample in forgiveness. He knows you well when He brings you out of the earth, And when ye are hidden in your mothers' wombs. Therefore justify not yourselves: He knows best who it is that guards against evil.

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي تَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Seest thou one who turns back,

verses.content: وَأَعْطَىٰ قَلِيلًا وَأَكْدَىٰ
verses.translation: Gives a little, then hardens (his heart)?

verses.content: أَعِندَهُ عِلْمُ الْغَيْبِ فَهُوَ يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: What! Has he knowledge of the Unseen so that he can see?

verses.content: أَمْ لَمْ يُنَبَّأْ بِمَا فِي صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: Nay, is he not acquainted with what is in the Books of Moses-

verses.content: وَإِبْرَاهِيمَ الَّذِي وَفَّىٰ
verses.translation: And of Abraham who fulfilled his engagements?-

verses.content: أَلَّا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Namely, that no bearer of burdens can bear the burden of another;

verses.content: وَأَن لَّيْسَ لِلْإِنسَانِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: That man can have nothing but what he strives for;

verses.content: وَأَنَّ سَعْيَهُ سَوْفَ يُرَىٰ
verses.translation: That (the fruit of) his striving will soon come in sight:

verses.content: ثُمَّ يُجْزَاهُ الْجَزَاءَ الْأَوْفَىٰ
verses.translation: Then will he be rewarded with a reward complete;

verses.content: وَأَنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الْمُنتَهَىٰ
verses.translation: That to thy Lord is the final Goal;

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَضْحَكَ وَأَبْكَىٰ
verses.translation: That it is He Who granteth Laughter and Tears;

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَمَاتَ وَأَحْيَا
verses.translation: That it is He Who granteth Death and Life;

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ خَلَقَ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: That He did create in pairs,- male and female,

verses.content: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ إِذَا تُمْنَىٰ
verses.translation: From a seed when lodged (in its place);

verses.content: وَأَنَّ عَلَيْهِ النَّشْأَةَ الْأُخْرَىٰ
verses.translation: That He hath promised a Second Creation (Raising of the Dead);

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ أَغْنَىٰ وَأَقْنَىٰ
verses.translation: That it is He Who giveth wealth and satisfaction;

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ هُوَ رَبُّ الشِّعْرَىٰ
verses.translation: That He is the Lord of Sirius (the Mighty Star);

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُ أَهْلَكَ عَادًا الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And that it is He Who destroyed the (powerful) ancient 'Ad (people),

verses.content: وَثَمُودَ فَمَا أَبْقَىٰ
verses.translation: And the Thamud nor gave them a lease of perpetual life.

verses.content: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا هُمْ أَظْلَمَ وَأَطْغَىٰ
verses.translation: And before them, the people of Noah, for that they were (all) most unjust and most insolent transgressors,

verses.content: وَالْمُؤْتَفِكَةَ أَهْوَىٰ
verses.translation: And He destroyed the Overthrown Cities (of Sodom and Gomorrah).

verses.content: فَغَشَّاهَا مَا غَشَّىٰ
verses.translation: So that (ruins unknown) have covered them up.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمَارَىٰ
verses.translation: Then which of the gifts of thy Lord, (O man,) wilt thou dispute about?

verses.content: هَـٰذَا نَذِيرٌ مِّنَ النُّذُرِ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: This is a Warner, of the (series of) Warners of old!

verses.content: أَزِفَتِ الْآزِفَةُ
verses.translation: The (Judgment) ever approaching draws nigh:

verses.content: لَيْسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ
verses.translation: No (soul) but Allah can lay it bare.

verses.content: أَفَمِنْ هَـٰذَا الْحَدِيثِ تَعْجَبُونَ
verses.translation: Do ye then wonder at this recital?

verses.content: وَتَضْحَكُونَ وَلَا تَبْكُونَ
verses.translation: And will ye laugh and not weep,-

verses.content: وَأَنتُمْ سَامِدُونَ
verses.translation: Wasting your time in vanities?

verses.content: فَاسْجُدُوا لِلَّهِ وَاعْبُدُوا ۩
verses.translation: But fall ye down in prostration to Allah, and adore (Him)!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ اقْتَرَبَتِ السَّاعَةُ وَانشَقَّ الْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: The Hour (of Judgment) is nigh, and the moon is cleft asunder.

verses.content: وَإِن يَرَوْا آيَةً يُعْرِضُوا وَيَقُولُوا سِحْرٌ مُّسْتَمِرٌّ
verses.translation: But if they see a Sign, they turn away, and say, "This is (but) transient magic."

verses.content: وَكَذَّبُوا وَاتَّبَعُوا أَهْوَاءَهُمْ ۚ وَكُلُّ أَمْرٍ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.translation: They reject (the warning) and follow their (own) lusts but every matter has its appointed time.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَهُم مِّنَ الْأَنبَاءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزْدَجَرٌ
verses.translation: There have already come to them Recitals wherein there is (enough) to check (them),

verses.content: حِكْمَةٌ بَالِغَةٌ ۖ فَمَا تُغْنِ النُّذُرُ
verses.translation: Mature wisdom;- but (the preaching of) Warners profits them not.

verses.content: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ ۘ يَوْمَ يَدْعُ الدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيْءٍ نُّكُرٍ
verses.translation: Therefore, (O Prophet,) turn away from them. The Day that the Caller will call (them) to a terrible affair,

verses.content: خُشَّعًا أَبْصَارُهُمْ يَخْرُجُونَ مِنَ الْأَجْدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمْ جَرَادٌ مُّنتَشِرٌ
verses.translation: They will come forth,- their eyes humbled - from (their) graves, (torpid) like locusts scattered abroad,

verses.content: مُّهْطِعِينَ إِلَى الدَّاعِ ۖ يَقُولُ الْكَافِرُونَ هَـٰذَا يَوْمٌ عَسِرٌ
verses.translation: Hastening, with eyes transfixed, towards the Caller!- "Hard is this Day!", the Unbelievers will say.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ فَكَذَّبُوا عَبْدَنَا وَقَالُوا مَجْنُونٌ وَازْدُجِرَ
verses.translation: Before them the People of Noah rejected (their messenger): they rejected Our servant, and said, "Here is one possessed!", and he was driven out.

verses.content: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَغْلُوبٌ فَانتَصِرْ
verses.translation: Then he called on his Lord: "I am one overcome: do Thou then help (me)!"

verses.content: فَفَتَحْنَا أَبْوَابَ السَّمَاءِ بِمَاءٍ مُّنْهَمِرٍ
verses.translation: So We opened the gates of heaven, with water pouring forth.

verses.content: وَفَجَّرْنَا الْأَرْضَ عُيُونًا فَالْتَقَى الْمَاءُ عَلَىٰ أَمْرٍ قَدْ قُدِرَ
verses.translation: And We caused the earth to gush forth with springs, so the waters met (and rose) to the extent decreed.

verses.content: وَحَمَلْنَاهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلْوَاحٍ وَدُسُرٍ
verses.translation: But We bore him on an (Ark) made of broad planks and caulked with palm-fibre:

verses.content: تَجْرِي بِأَعْيُنِنَا جَزَاءً لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
verses.translation: She floats under our eyes (and care): a recompense to one who had been rejected (with scorn)!

verses.content: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَاهَا آيَةً فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We have left this as a Sign (for all time): then is there any that will receive admonition?

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: But how (terrible) was My Penalty and My Warning?

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We have indeed made the Qur'an easy to understand and remember: then is there any that will receive admonition?

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: The 'Ad (people) (too) rejected (Truth): then how terrible was My Penalty and My Warning?

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ رِيحًا صَرْصَرًا فِي يَوْمِ نَحْسٍ مُّسْتَمِرٍّ
verses.translation: For We sent against them a furious wind, on a Day of violent Disaster,

verses.content: تَنزِعُ النَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمْ أَعْجَازُ نَخْلٍ مُّنقَعِرٍ
verses.translation: Plucking out men as if they were roots of palm-trees torn up (from the ground).

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: Yea, how (terrible) was My Penalty and My Warning!

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: But We have indeed made the Qur'an easy to understand and remember: then is there any that will receive admonition?

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: The Thamud (also) rejected (their) Warners.

verses.content: فَقَالُوا أَبَشَرًا مِّنَّا وَاحِدًا نَّتَّبِعُهُ إِنَّا إِذًا لَّفِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: For they said: "What! a man! a Solitary one from among ourselves! shall we follow such a one? Truly should we then be straying in mind, and mad!

verses.content: أَأُلْقِيَ الذِّكْرُ عَلَيْهِ مِن بَيْنِنَا بَلْ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٌ
verses.translation: "Is it that the Message is sent to him, of all people amongst us? Nay, he is a liar, an insolent one!"

verses.content: سَيَعْلَمُونَ غَدًا مَّنِ الْكَذَّابُ الْأَشِرُ
verses.translation: Ah! they will know on the morrow, which is the liar, the insolent one!

verses.content: إِنَّا مُرْسِلُو النَّاقَةِ فِتْنَةً لَّهُمْ فَارْتَقِبْهُمْ وَاصْطَبِرْ
verses.translation: For We will send the she-camel by way of trial for them. So watch them, (O Salih), and possess thyself in patience!

verses.content: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ أَنَّ الْمَاءَ قِسْمَةٌ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلُّ شِرْبٍ مُّحْتَضَرٌ
verses.translation: And tell them that the water is to be divided between them: Each one's right to drink being brought forward (by suitable turns).

verses.content: فَنَادَوْا صَاحِبَهُمْ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.translation: But they called to their companion, and he took a sword in hand, and hamstrung (her).

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: Ah! how (terrible) was My Penalty and My Warning!

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً فَكَانُوا كَهَشِيمِ الْمُحْتَظِرِ
verses.translation: For We sent against them a single Mighty Blast, and they became like the dry stubble used by one who pens cattle.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We have indeed made the Qur'an easy to understand and remember: then is there any that will receive admonition?

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍ بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: The people of Lut rejected (his) warning.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حَاصِبًا إِلَّا آلَ لُوطٍ ۖ نَّجَّيْنَاهُم بِسَحَرٍ
verses.translation: We sent against them a violent Tornado with showers of stones, (which destroyed them), except Lut's household: them We delivered by early Dawn,-

verses.content: نِّعْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي مَن شَكَرَ
verses.translation: As a Grace from Us: thus do We reward those who give thanks.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَنذَرَهُم بَطْشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوْا بِالنُّذُرِ
verses.translation: And (Lut) did warn them of Our Punishment, but they disputed about the Warning.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ رَاوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيْفِهِ فَطَمَسْنَا أَعْيُنَهُمْ فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: And they even sought to snatch away his guests from him, but We blinded their eyes. (They heard:) "Now taste ye My Wrath and My Warning."

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ صَبَّحَهُم بُكْرَةً عَذَابٌ مُّسْتَقِرٌّ
verses.translation: Early on the morrow an abiding Punishment seized them:

verses.content: فَذُوقُوا عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.translation: "So taste ye My Wrath and My Warning."

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ يَسَّرْنَا الْقُرْآنَ لِلذِّكْرِ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And We have indeed made the Qur'an easy to understand and remember: then is there any that will receive admonition?

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ جَاءَ آلَ فِرْعَوْنَ النُّذُرُ
verses.translation: To the People of Pharaoh, too, aforetime, came Warners (from Allah).

verses.content: كَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذْنَاهُمْ أَخْذَ عَزِيزٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
verses.translation: The (people) rejected all Our Signs; but We seized them with such Penalty (as comes) from One Exalted in Power, able to carry out His Will.

verses.content: أَكُفَّارُكُمْ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أُولَـٰئِكُمْ أَمْ لَكُم بَرَاءَةٌ فِي الزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: Are your Unbelievers, (O Quraish), better than they? Or have ye an immunity in the Sacred Books?

verses.content: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ نَحْنُ جَمِيعٌ مُّنتَصِرٌ
verses.translation: Or do they say: "We acting together can defend ourselves"?

verses.content: سَيُهْزَمُ الْجَمْعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ الدُّبُرَ
verses.translation: Soon will their multitude be put to flight, and they will show their backs.

verses.content: بَلِ السَّاعَةُ مَوْعِدُهُمْ وَالسَّاعَةُ أَدْهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.translation: Nay, the Hour (of Judgment) is the time promised them (for their full recompense): And that Hour will be most grievous and most bitter.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُجْرِمِينَ فِي ضَلَالٍ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.translation: Truly those in sin are the ones straying in mind, and mad.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُسْحَبُونَ فِي النَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمْ ذُوقُوا مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: The Day they will be dragged through the Fire on their faces, (they will hear:) "Taste ye the touch of Hell!"

verses.content: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقْنَاهُ بِقَدَرٍ
verses.translation: Verily, all things have We created in proportion and measure.

verses.content: وَمَا أَمْرُنَا إِلَّا وَاحِدَةٌ كَلَمْحٍ بِالْبَصَرِ
verses.translation: And Our Command is but a single (Act),- like the twinkling of an eye.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَا أَشْيَاعَكُمْ فَهَلْ مِن مُّدَّكِرٍ
verses.translation: And (oft) in the past, have We destroyed gangs like unto you: then is there any that will receive admonition?

verses.content: وَكُلُّ شَيْءٍ فَعَلُوهُ فِي الزُّبُرِ
verses.translation: All that they do is noted in (their) Books (of Deeds):

verses.content: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٍ وَكَبِيرٍ مُّسْتَطَرٌ
verses.translation: Every matter, small and great, is on record.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَنَهَرٍ
verses.translation: As to the Righteous, they will be in the midst of Gardens and Rivers,

verses.content: فِي مَقْعَدِ صِدْقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٍ مُّقْتَدِرٍ
verses.translation: In an Assembly of Truth, in the Presence of a Sovereign Omnipotent.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ
verses.translation: (Allah) Most Gracious!

verses.content: عَلَّمَ الْقُرْآنَ
verses.translation: It is He Who has taught the Qur'an.

verses.content: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ
verses.translation: He has created man:

verses.content: عَلَّمَهُ الْبَيَانَ
verses.translation: He has taught him speech (and intelligence).

verses.content: الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ بِحُسْبَانٍ
verses.translation: The sun and the moon follow courses (exactly) computed;

verses.content: وَالنَّجْمُ وَالشَّجَرُ يَسْجُدَانِ
verses.translation: And the herbs and the trees - both (alike) prostrate in adoration.

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءَ رَفَعَهَا وَوَضَعَ الْمِيزَانَ
verses.translation: And the Firmament has He raised high, and He has set up the Balance (of Justice),

verses.content: أَلَّا تَطْغَوْا فِي الْمِيزَانِ
verses.translation: In order that ye may not transgress (due) balance.

verses.content: وَأَقِيمُوا الْوَزْنَ بِالْقِسْطِ وَلَا تُخْسِرُوا الْمِيزَانَ
verses.translation: So establish weight with justice and fall not short in the balance.

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلْأَنَامِ
verses.translation: It is He Who has spread out the earth for (His) creatures:

verses.content: فِيهَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَالنَّخْلُ ذَاتُ الْأَكْمَامِ
verses.translation: Therein is fruit and date-palms, producing spathes (enclosing dates);

verses.content: وَالْحَبُّ ذُو الْعَصْفِ وَالرَّيْحَانُ
verses.translation: Also corn, with (its) leaves and stalk for fodder, and sweet-smelling plants.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ مِن صَلْصَالٍ كَالْفَخَّارِ
verses.translation: He created man from sounding clay like unto pottery,

verses.content: وَخَلَقَ الْجَانَّ مِن مَّارِجٍ مِّن نَّارٍ
verses.translation: And He created Jinns from fire free of smoke:

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: رَبُّ الْمَشْرِقَيْنِ وَرَبُّ الْمَغْرِبَيْنِ
verses.translation: (He is) Lord of the two Easts and Lord of the two Wests:

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: مَرَجَ الْبَحْرَيْنِ يَلْتَقِيَانِ
verses.translation: He has let free the two bodies of flowing water, meeting together:

verses.content: بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخٌ لَّا يَبْغِيَانِ
verses.translation: Between them is a Barrier which they do not transgress:

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: يَخْرُجُ مِنْهُمَا اللُّؤْلُؤُ وَالْمَرْجَانُ
verses.translation: Out of them come Pearls and Coral:

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: وَلَهُ الْجَوَارِ الْمُنشَآتُ فِي الْبَحْرِ كَالْأَعْلَامِ
verses.translation: And His are the Ships sailing smoothly through the seas, lofty as mountains:

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: كُلُّ مَنْ عَلَيْهَا فَانٍ
verses.translation: All that is on earth will perish:

verses.content: وَيَبْقَىٰ وَجْهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو الْجَلَالِ وَالْإِكْرَامِ
verses.translation: But will abide (for ever) the Face of thy Lord,- full of Majesty, Bounty and Honour.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: يَسْأَلُهُ مَن فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ كُلَّ يَوْمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأْنٍ
verses.translation: Of Him seeks (its need) every creature in the heavens and on earth: every day in (new) Splendour doth He (shine)!

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: سَنَفْرُغُ لَكُمْ أَيُّهَ الثَّقَلَانِ
verses.translation: Soon shall We settle your affairs, O both ye worlds!

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: يَا مَعْشَرَ الْجِنِّ وَالْإِنسِ إِنِ اسْتَطَعْتُمْ أَن تَنفُذُوا مِنْ أَقْطَارِ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ فَانفُذُوا ۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلْطَانٍ
verses.translation: O ye assembly of Jinns and men! If it be ye can pass beyond the zones of the heavens and the earth, pass ye! not without authority shall ye be able to pass!

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: يُرْسَلُ عَلَيْكُمَا شُوَاظٌ مِّن نَّارٍ وَنُحَاسٌ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ
verses.translation: On you will be sent (O ye evil ones twain!) a flame of fire (to burn) and a smoke (to choke): no defence will ye have:

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: فَإِذَا انشَقَّتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ وَرْدَةً كَالدِّهَانِ
verses.translation: When the sky is rent asunder, and it becomes red like ointment:

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُسْأَلُ عَن ذَنبِهِ إِنسٌ وَلَا جَانٌّ
verses.translation: On that Day no question will be asked of man or Jinn as to his sin.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: يُعْرَفُ الْمُجْرِمُونَ بِسِيمَاهُمْ فَيُؤْخَذُ بِالنَّوَاصِي وَالْأَقْدَامِ
verses.translation: (For) the sinners will be known by their marks: and they will be seized by their forelocks and their feet.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: هَـٰذِهِ جَهَنَّمُ الَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا الْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: This is the Hell which the Sinners deny:

verses.content: يَطُوفُونَ بَيْنَهَا وَبَيْنَ حَمِيمٍ آنٍ
verses.translation: In its midst and in the midst of boiling hot water will they wander round!

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: وَلِمَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ جَنَّتَانِ
verses.translation: But for such as fear the time when they will stand before (the Judgment Seat of) their Lord, there will be two Gardens-

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?-

verses.content: ذَوَاتَا أَفْنَانٍ
verses.translation: Containing all kinds (of trees and delights);-

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?-

verses.content: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ تَجْرِيَانِ
verses.translation: In them (each) will be two Springs flowing (free);

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?-

verses.content: فِيهِمَا مِن كُلِّ فَاكِهَةٍ زَوْجَانِ
verses.translation: In them will be Fruits of every kind, two and two.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: مُتَّكِئِينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشٍ بَطَائِنُهَا مِنْ إِسْتَبْرَقٍ ۚ وَجَنَى الْجَنَّتَيْنِ دَانٍ
verses.translation: They will recline on Carpets, whose inner linings will be of rich brocade: the Fruit of the Gardens will be near (and easy of reach).

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: فِيهِنَّ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَانٌّ
verses.translation: In them will be (Maidens), chaste, restraining their glances, whom no man or Jinn before them has touched;-

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?-

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُنَّ الْيَاقُوتُ وَالْمَرْجَانُ
verses.translation: Like unto Rubies and coral.

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: هَلْ جَزَاءُ الْإِحْسَانِ إِلَّا الْإِحْسَانُ
verses.translation: Is there any Reward for Good - other than Good?

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: وَمِن دُونِهِمَا جَنَّتَانِ
verses.translation: And besides these two, there are two other Gardens,-

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?-

verses.content: مُدْهَامَّتَانِ
verses.translation: Dark-green in colour (from plentiful watering).

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ نَضَّاخَتَانِ
verses.translation: In them (each) will be two Springs pouring forth water in continuous abundance:

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: فِيهِمَا فَاكِهَةٌ وَنَخْلٌ وَرُمَّانٌ
verses.translation: In them will be Fruits, and dates and pomegranates:

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?

verses.content: فِيهِنَّ خَيْرَاتٌ حِسَانٌ
verses.translation: In them will be fair (Companions), good, beautiful;-

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?-

verses.content: حُورٌ مَّقْصُورَاتٌ فِي الْخِيَامِ
verses.translation: Companions restrained (as to their glances), in (goodly) pavilions;-

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
verses.translation: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny?-

verses.content: لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلَا جَانٌّ
verses.translation: Whom no man or Jinn before them has touched;-

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ آلَاءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
